Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
The AI&Automation team is responsible for coordinating all efforts implied to increase AI&Automation adoption across HP’s Commercial Organization, providing RPA/AI/ML solutions to business use cases.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities, match with both traditional ML methods (forecasting algorithms, recommender systems) and Generative AI and large language models. and deploy solutions in real-world applications. Your expertise in AI algorithms, deep learning architectures, and advanced ML techniques will be crucial in driving innovative AI initiatives within the organization.

Main Responsibilities


Increase the adoption of AI/ML technology within HP’s Commercial Organization by finding applicability of technology in real business challenges, and ensuring adoption of the solutions built
Collaborates with AI& Automation Product Owner to validate backlog priorities and whether similar solutions might be in place and could be scaled/ leveraged.
Collaborates with cross-functional teams: data scientists, data/cloud engineers, fe/be/RPA developers, and domain experts to make sure the business requirements for the identified AI opportunities are properly turned into viable and sustainable AI solutions that address the specific challenges and can be adopted
Engages with business stakeholders who need AI/ML solutions to understand the requirements and recommend the proper solution for their need, connects model results to business strategy, and produces recommendations that match business situation.
Oversees AI/ML initiatives funnel for Commercial Organization from a business architecture perspective and provides guidance and technical leadership.
Designs and implements models to discover patterns and predictions that generate business value and innovation. Develops and implements AI/ML models: from data preprocessing and feature engineering to ensure high-quality data inputs for AI models to model development and fine-tuning to address issues of overfitting or underfitting. Delivers performance evaluations and model validations to assess the effectiveness of the AI/ML models in our portfolio.
Leads complex cross-functional project, which involves several Data Scientists, and/or additional roles required.
Contributes actively to refine and keep relevant the AI& Automation learning path for all levels, from Explorer, Literacy to Fluency and Mastery
Communicates insights and recommendations: Presents findings, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner, adapted to business understanding. Translates complex technical concepts into actionable insights for non-technical audiences. Effectively collaborates with Managers, Directors, Executives.
Coaches team members, shares knowledge, and contributes to the growth and development of the CO AI& Automation Community. Can act as trainer for Community members in “Office Hours” meetings or via AI/ML support channel.
Stays updated with AI research and advancements: Keeps abreast of the latest trends, techniques, and research papers in the field of AI and machine learning. Continuously explores new algorithms and approaches to enhance the organization's AI capabilities.
Manages vendor/technologies identification and selection process when external solutions are required


Job Requirements


Bachelor's, master's or Ph.D. degree in Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Computer Science, or equivalent.
Typically, 6-10 years of relevant work experience.
Strong expertise in AI algorithms, neural networks, deep learning architectures, and advanced machine learning techniques.
Relevant experience using statistics, mathematics, algorithms, and programming languages to solve business problems. Solid understanding of statistics, linear algebra, and calculus.
Experience with NLP, Large Language Models, LLM prompt engineering, vector databases, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), and search engines.
Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model development.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or TensorFlow.
Broader understanding of the AI landscape beyond just data science, including natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, and reinforcement learning.
Ability to define and create complex ML models to pull valuable insights, predictions, and innovation from data.
Proven track record of delivering successful AI projects or research work.
Familiarity with popular AI frameworks, libraries, and tools.


Knowledge & Skills


Proper understanding of digital industry trends (RPA, AI, ML) and their benefits.
Advanced communication skills (i.e. written, verbal, presentation) and collaboration skills to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively to tackle complex AI challenges.
Proven experience working in globally distributed virtual teams
Proficiency in English is a must
Leadership, consulting, influence, and negotiation skills.
Ability to interact with all levels of the company top to bottom, including most senior company management.
Ability to effectively communicate data insights and negotiate options at senior management levels.
Ability to work effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders to ensure successful AI/ML implementation.
Excellent program management, problem solving, and analytical skills, and the ability to execute a program within the scope of overall strategies.
Team player
Show more
HTML:
The AI&Automation team is responsible for coordinating all efforts implied to increase AI&Automation adoption across HP’s Commercial Organization, providing RPA/AI/ML solutions to business use cases.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities, match with both traditional ML methods (forecasting algorithms, recommender systems) and Generative AI and large language models. and deploy solutions in real-world applications. Your expertise in AI algorithms, deep learning architectures, and advanced ML techniques will be crucial in driving innovative AI initiatives within the organization.

Main Responsibilities

  • Increase the adoption of AI/ML technology within HP’s Commercial Organization by finding applicability of technology in real business challenges, and ensuring adoption of the solutions built
  • Collaborates with AI& Automation Product Owner to validate backlog priorities and whether similar solutions might be in place and could be scaled/ leveraged.
  • Collaborates with cross-functional teams: data scientists, data/cloud engineers, fe/be/RPA developers, and domain experts to make sure the business requirements for the identified AI opportunities are properly turned into viable and sustainable AI solutions that address the specific challenges and can be adopted
  • Engages with business stakeholders who need AI/ML solutions to understand the requirements and recommend the proper solution for their need, connects model results to business strategy, and produces recommendations that match business situation.
  • Oversees AI/ML initiatives funnel for Commercial Organization from a business architecture perspective and provides guidance and technical leadership.
  • Designs and implements models to discover patterns and predictions that generate business value and innovation. Develops and implements AI/ML models: from data preprocessing and feature engineering to ensure high-quality data inputs for AI models to model development and fine-tuning to address issues of overfitting or underfitting. Delivers performance evaluations and model validations to assess the effectiveness of the AI/ML models in our portfolio.
  • Leads complex cross-functional project, which involves several Data Scientists, and/or additional roles required.
  • Contributes actively to refine and keep relevant the AI& Automation learning path for all levels, from Explorer, Literacy to Fluency and Mastery
  • Communicates insights and recommendations: Presents findings, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner, adapted to business understanding. Translates complex technical concepts into actionable insights for non-technical audiences. Effectively collaborates with Managers, Directors, Executives.
  • Coaches team members, shares knowledge, and contributes to the growth and development of the CO AI& Automation Community. Can act as trainer for Community members in “Office Hours” meetings or via AI/ML support channel.
  • Stays updated with AI research and advancements: Keeps abreast of the latest trends, techniques, and research papers in the field of AI and machine learning. Continuously explores new algorithms and approaches to enhance the organization's AI capabilities.
  • Manages vendor/technologies identification and selection process when external solutions are required

Job Requirements

  • Bachelor's, master's or Ph.D. degree in Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Computer Science, or equivalent.
  • Typically, 6-10 years of relevant work experience.
  • Strong expertise in AI algorithms, neural networks, deep learning architectures, and advanced machine learning techniques.
  • Relevant experience using statistics, mathematics, algorithms, and programming languages to solve business problems. Solid understanding of statistics, linear algebra, and calculus.
  • Experience with NLP, Large Language Models, LLM prompt engineering, vector databases, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), and search engines.
  • Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model development.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or TensorFlow.
  • Broader understanding of the AI landscape beyond just data science, including natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, and reinforcement learning.
  • Ability to define and create complex ML models to pull valuable insights, predictions, and innovation from data.
  • Proven track record of delivering successful AI projects or research work.
  • Familiarity with popular AI frameworks, libraries, and tools.

Knowledge & Skills

  • Proper understanding of digital industry trends (RPA, AI, ML) and their benefits.
  • Advanced communication skills (i.e. written, verbal, presentation) and collaboration skills to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively to tackle complex AI challenges.
  • Proven experience working in globally distributed virtual teams
  • Proficiency in English is a must
  • Leadership, consulting, influence, and negotiation skills.
  • Ability to interact with all levels of the company top to bottom, including most senior company management.
  • Ability to effectively communicate data insights and negotiate options at senior management levels.
  • Ability to work effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders to ensure successful AI/ML implementation.
  • Excellent program management, problem solving, and analytical skills, and the ability to execute a program within the scope of overall strategies.
  • Team player

Title: Research Engineer - Python data pipelines engineer (RE2)
Description:
Job Reference

208_25_ES_EDD_RE2

Position

Research Engineer - Python data pipelines engineer (RE2)

Closing Date

Tuesday, 11 March, 2025

Reference: 208_25_ES_EDD_RE2

Job title: Research Engineer - Python data pipelines engineer (RE2)

About BSC

The Barcelona Supercomputing Center - Centro Nacional de Supercomputación (BSC-CNS) is the leading supercomputing center in Spain. It houses MareNostrum, one of the most powerful supercomputers in Europe, was a founding and hosting member of the former European HPC infrastructure PRACE (Partnership for Advanced Computing in Europe), and is now hosting entity for EuroHPC JU, the Joint Undertaking that leads large-scale investments and HPC provision in Europe. The mission of BSC is to research, develop and manage information technologies in order to facilitate scientific progress. BSC combines HPC service provision and R&D into both computer and computational science (life, earth and engineering sciences) under one roof, and currently has over 1000 staff from 60 countries.

Look At The BSC Experience

BSC-CNS YouTube Channel

Let's stay connected with BSC Folks!

We are particularly interested for this role in the strengths and lived experiences of women and underrepresented groups to help us avoid perpetuating biases and oversights in science and IT research. In instances of equal merit, the incorporation of the under-represented sex will be favoured.

We promote Equity, Diversity and Inclusion, fostering an environment where each and every one of us is appreciated for who we are, regardless of our differences.

If you consider that you do not meet all the requirements, we encourage you to continue applying for the job offer. We value diversity of experiences and skills, and you could bring unique perspectives to our team.

Context And Mission

Within the Earth Sciences department, led by Pr Francisco Doblas-Reyes, the Data and Diagnostics Team is involved in different European projects where we the design of efficient data pipelines is required. This includes for example the Destination Earth program, the EERIE project, or new calls related to the preparation of data for Artificial Intelligence applications.

The successful applicant will join the BSC Computational Earth Sciences group, within the Earth Sciences Department, to help with the practical implementation of these pipelines to transform the data from the native format (grib, netcdf or CSV) to the format required by the different tools downstream. This includes the technical development of the tool but also their performance analysis and optimization.

This task will be complemented by the support in the writing European proposals in the data pipelines parts.

Key Duties


Contribute to the development and optimization of data pipelines in DestinE
Contribute to the development and optimization of data pipelines in EERIE
Support the writing of the data pipelines tasks in European proposals


Requirements


Education
Having a Bachelor in Computer Science, Telecommunications, Physics or related discipline
Essential Knowledge and Professional Experience
Excellent computing skills in Python and experience with UNIX/LINUX environments and scripting languages (bash,etc)
Experience in managing large datasets and Python parallelization
Additional Knowledge and Professional Experience
Knowledge of climate data formats (NetCDF, grib) will be valued
Previous experience in scientific software and tools (CDO, CDFTools, ESMValTools, Numpy and Scipy, Xarray,... etc) will be valued
Good programming skills to manage big and collaborative projects and experience with git and/or SVN
Competences
Capacity to interact and build strong relations with both climate and computer scientists.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to take initiatives, prioritize the tasks and work under set deadlines.
Ability to work both independently and within a team.
Ability to learn and adapt to multiple programming languages easily.
Fluency in English, both speaking and writing

Conditions


The position will be located at BSC within the Earth Sciences Department
We offer a full-time contract (37.5h/week), a good working environment, a highly stimulating environment with state-of-the-art infrastructure, flexible working hours, extensive training plan, restaurant tickets, private health insurance, support to the relocation procedures
Duration: Open-ended contract due to technical and scientific activities linked to the project and budget duration
Holidays: 23 paid vacation days plus 24th and 31st of December per our collective agreement
Salary: we offer a competitive salary commensurate with the qualifications and experience of the candidate and according to the cost of living in Barcelona
Starting date: as soon as possible


Applications procedure and process

All applications must be submitted via the BSC website and contain:


A full CV in English including contact details
A cover/motivation letter with a statement of interest in English, clearly specifying for which specific area and topics the applicant wishes to be considered. Additionally, two references for further contacts must be included. Applications without this document will not be considered.


Development of the recruitment process

The selection will be carried out through a competitive examination system ("Concurso-Oposición"). The recruitment process consists of two phases:


Curriculum Analysis: Evaluation of previous experience and/or scientific history, degree, training, and other professional information relevant to the position. - 40 points
Interview phase: The highest-rated candidates at the curriculum level will be invited to the interview phase, conducted by the corresponding department and Human Resources. In this phase, technical competencies, knowledge, skills, and professional experience related to the position, as well as the required personal competencies, will be evaluated. - 60 points. A minimum of 30 points out of 60 must be obtained to be eligible for the position.


The recruitment panel will be composed of at least three people, ensuring at least 25% representation of women.

In accordance with OTM-R principles, a gender-balanced recruitment panel is formed for each vacancy at the beginning of the process. After reviewing the content of the applications, the panel will begin the interviews, with at least one technical and one administrative interview. At a minimum, a personality questionnaire as well as a technical exercise will be conducted during the process.

The panel will make a final decision, and all individuals who participated in the interview phase will receive feedback with details on the acceptance or rejection of their profile.

At BSC, we seek continuous improvement in our recruitment processes. For any suggestions or comments/complaints about our recruitment processes, please contact recruitment@bsc.es.

For more information, please follow this link.

Deadline

The vacancy will remain open until a suitable candidate has been hired. Applications will be regularly reviewed and potential candidates will be contacted.

OTM-R principles for selection processes

BSC-CNS is committed to the principles of the Code of Conduct for the Recruitment of Researchers of the European Commission and the Open, Transparent and Merit-based Recruitment principles (OTM-R). This is applied for any potential candidate in all our processes, for example by creating gender-balanced recruitment panels and recognizing career breaks etc.

BSC-CNS is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability or any other basis protected by applicable state or local law.

For more information follow this link

please choose one of this and if needed describe the option : - BSC Website - Euraxess - Spotify - HiPeac - LinkedIn - Networking/Referral: include who and how - Events (Forum, career fairs): include who and how - Through University: include the university name - Specialized website (Metjobs, BIB, other): include which one - Other social Networks: (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube): include which one - Other (Glassdoor, ResearchGate, job search website and other cases): include which one

Title: Head of Data Science & Analytics
Description:
Location: Barcelona Office, hybrid

About the Role:

We are seeking a Head of Data Science & Analytics to lead and elevate our data function at Heetch. This role blends technical expertise with strategic influence, ensuring that data is at the heart of every product and business decision.

You will oversee a high-performing team of data scientists and product analysts, focusing on maximising impact, driving experimentation, and fostering continuous growth. You will empower and up skill existing talent, helping them expand their capabilities and ownership.

What You’ll Do:

Leadership & Team Development

- Mentor, coach, and develop data scientists and analysts to reach their full potential.

- Create growth opportunities within the team, ensuring they take on new challenges and expand their expertise.

- Foster a culture of analytical excellence, curiosity, and ownership.

Data Strategy & Execution

- Define and drive the data science & analytics roadmap, aligning with business and product priorities.

- Balance predictive modeling, experimentation, and deep analytics to unlock strategic opportunities.

- Ensure best practices in data governance, quality, and scalability.

Experimentation & Decision Science

- Scale A/B testing and causal inference frameworks to support data-driven product iteration.

- Develop methodologies to measure impact and optimize key metrics.

- Partner with PMs, engineers, and leadership to ensure data is a central part of decision-making.

Product & Business Impact

- Leverage data storytelling and advanced analytics to influence strategic decisions.

- Bridge data science and product analytics, ensuring teams have the right tools and insights to move fast.

- Advocate for a data-driven culture, helping teams translate insights into action.

Challenges You’ll Face:

- Balancing technical depth with strategic priorities.

- Building and maintaining alignment across diverse stakeholders.

- Navigating the competitive landscape of the mobility industry.

About You:

- 10+ years of experience in Data Science, Analytics, or a related field, with 5+ years of leadership experience.

- Proven ability to recruit, develop and mentor high-performing teams.

- Deep expertise in Python, SQL, and statistical modeling, with experience in production-grade data science.

- Strong background in experimentation, A/B testing, and causal inference.

- Exceptional ability to translate complex data insights into business actions.

✨ Bonus Points

- Experience in mobility, marketplace, or consumer tech industries.

- Familiarity with ML in production and real-time analytics.

- Hands-on experience with modern data platforms (BigQuery, Dataform, Vertex, Amplitude, etc.).

What We Value:

Transparency: Foster open communication and a culture of honesty.

Empowerment: Enable teams to innovate and experiment freely.

Learning-Oriented: Turn challenges into opportunities for growth.

Collaboration: Build strong relationships with cross-functional teams.







🌈Heetch embraces diversity and equal opportunity for everyone 🌍 We provide a safe and inclusive work environment. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. 

For non-European citizens, a valid working visa for France is required to be eligible for the role.

Heetch SAS is collecting your personal data (identity, contact details, academic background, professional experience and optionally a covering letter) for the processing of your application to our job offer, based on your consent.

Your personal data will only be accessible to our hiring team, our co-founders, and the manager of the position you are applying to. In addition, data are stored by our processor in order to use its applications tracking system. Your data may be stored outside of the EU/EEA but are protected by appropriated safeguards.

Your data are stored for a maximum duration of two years. If we do not reply to your application, you allow us to store your data during this term in order to potentially contact you for another position within our company or affiliates and subsidiaries.

You have a right to access to your data, to rectify them, under some conditions to erase them, and to limit the processing. Also, you have a right of portability on your data. In addition, you may revoke your consent and we shall stop processing your data. Eventually, you have a right to define directives about the fate of your data if your death should occur. 

For more information about your rights, please see our privacy policy.

Title: Software Engineer (Python) - Permanent/Freelance
HTML:
The vente-privee group has consolidated its various European brands, together made up of 6000 employees, under one unified conglomerate: Veepee.

With Privalia, vente-exclusive, Designer & Friends, Eboutic and vente-privee, Veepee achieved a 3.7 billion Euro turnover as of 2018. Present in 14 countries now, Veepee is taking a leading role in the European digital commerce landscape.

📄 Job Description

Today we're looking for a Python developer to join our Payments team in VeepeeTech.

At Veepee, our Payments team ensures the secure and efficient processing of millions of transactions, while maintaining PCI DSS compliance and adapting to new regulations like WERO. We seek an expert with experience in Python backend development and if possible in financial system. You will help key projects such as merging business order pipelines, but also optimize performance, ensure security, and collaborate with cross-functional teams. Join us to work on impactful projects with cutting-edge technology in a dynamic and flexible environment.

🎯 TASKS

  • Develop new and redesign existing features of our products;
  • Suggest on interfaces and other possible improvements that might be done;
  • Write technical documentation;
  • Keep the code clean and review your team members’ designs if needed;
  • Ensure the reliability and scalability of developed applications;
  • Respect the production deadlines;
  • Review the legacy code in order to avoid the production bugs;


👉 MUST HAVE Skills

  • 4+ years of experience in software development;
  • Hands-on experience with Python
  • Proficiency with SQL databases;
  • Familiar with VMWare and Debian operating systems;
  • Experience in building APIs or other web services;
  • Quality-code oriented with unit and integration tests;
  • Agile working environment with open-source technologies;
  • Autonomous and open minded;
  • Professional English level


👉 NICE TO HAVE Skills

  • Experience in PCI DSS environment or payment/banking system;
  • Experience in high demanding platform, resiliency and production availability;
  • Experience with Rabbitmq, Haproxy and PGsql;
  • Experience with metrics over Prometheus


✅ Benefits

  • Variable bonus;
  • The dynamic and creative environment within international teams;
  • The variety of self-education courses on our e-learning platform;
  • Participation in meetups and conferences locally and internationally;
  • Flexible Office with up to 2 days at home


⚙️RECRUITMENT PROCESS

  • 1️⃣ 30-minute HR Screen with a Veepeeᵀᵉᶜʰ Recruiter
  • 2️⃣ General Technical exchange
  • 3️⃣Technical exchange with a tech lead
  • 4️⃣Team Interview


We are convinced that it is up to you to define the way you work, to develop yourself, and to progress. At Veepee we guarantee that you can just be yourself! For the service of diversity and inclusion, Veepee is committed to reviewing all applications received on an equal basis.

🔗COMPANY For more information about our ecosystem: https://careers.veepee.com/veepee-tech/

❓ Who We Are

Veepeeᵀᵉᶜʰ is a tech community of 600 collaborators who play a key role in Veepee’s innovative strategy.

From Warsaw to Sevilla, through Brussels, Amsterdam, Paris, Nantes, Nice, Barcelona, and Madrid all our projects are developed in an agile environment with a wide skills variety where you’ll be sure to find your place, no matter the technology you work with.

If you love to try things why don’t you jump on this new adventure?

Need more info > https://careers.veepee.com/en/

Vente-privee.com processes the collected data to handle the recruitment process, and to evaluate your ability to carry out the job offered and your professional skills. You can learn more about our use of your data and your rights by reading our recruiting privacy policy.

Title: R&D Scientist (Fragrance Performance Research)
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
Why working at Eurofragance?


In Eurofragance you will be part of the exciting world of smells and fragrances with our Passion, Performance & Entrepreneurship values.
You will grow and learn in a company in constant growth and expansion.
You will have the opportunity to develop with top professionals in the sector.
You will be part of a Global Company with Headquarters in Barcelona and subsidiaries in Dubai, Singapore, Mexico, Turkey and India among others.
You will practice your language skills in a global and multicultural environment.
You will feel you play a role in society thanks to our Corporate Social Responsibility policy and our commitment to the Environment, which we demonstrate on a day-to-day basis with actions such as the Volunteer Day.



Enjoy a great work environment in Eurofragance!

At our company, we're committed to creating an inclusive work environment where everyone feels welcome, regardless of their gender, age, sexual orientation, or any other factor. We encourage candidates from all walks of life to apply for this job vacancy, and we extend a particularly warm welcome to those with disabilities.

Mission

The role is positioned within Eurofragance’s R&D team, more specifically in the group focusing on the development of new ingredients and on the study and enhancement of fragrance performance. The mission is to generate useful knowledge for fragrance creation to design optimized fragrances with enhanced performance or secondary benefits such as mood modulation or malodor control. This objective will be achieved by understanding the relationship between the physic-chemical nature and composition of fragrances and the sensory, physiological and behavioral responses in consumers. In this mission, both physicochemical parameters and consumer responses need to be collected. The relationship between them will be studied by means of a data-analysis approach. A strong link with internal and external experts on artificial intelligence will be developed, along with a reflection and program development on the use of AI for technical projects in perfumery.

In these missions, collaborative work, also with colleagues in other departments such as perfumery, will be required.

Functions


Contribute to the strategic orientation of the research program
Search for previous art
Design of experiments to generate information of interest to carry out the mission (optimization of fragrance performance through their composition):
sensory studies (with panelists, experts or consumers)
Analytical measurements
Physical parameters determination
Carry out an experiments to generate data/knowledge.
Data treatment to get correlations of interest
Coordination of workgroups designed to collect the required data.
Become a reference in the digital transformation of the technical teams by initiating and leading projects.
Lab and equipment maintenance
Generation of reports


What we offer:


Stability and growth: Join a solid and constantly expanding company.
Social benefits: Enjoy health and life insurance.
International environment: Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team in a global environment.
Flexible remuneration with Cobee: Benefit from options such as meal vouchers, childcare vouchers, transportation tickets, training and family health insurance.
Flexible hours: Adapt your schedule for a better work-life balance.
Exclusive offers on perfumes: Buy perfumes at special prices for employees.
Health services: Access medical and physiotherapy services.
Comprehensive well-being: Enjoy our well-being plan with psychological support.
Sports facilities: Use our paddle tennis court, gym and participate in yoga classes



Requisitos:

Educational background:


Master in organic/analytical/physical chemistry research



Languages:


English intermediate
Spanish alto/nativo



Experience required:


Have worked in a chemistry research lab for 1 year
Experience in data analysis applied to chemical problems
Experience in sensory analysis techniques is a plus
Experience in working with scientific related tools: bibliography search, scientific databases, data treatment
Show more

Title: Statistical Data Scientist Lead
Description:
Location: Barcelona - Spain
Hybrid
Full time


Our Team

At Sanofi we are chasing the miracles of science to improve people’s lives. We at Global Supply Chain Strategy & Excellence support this ambition by driving strategy and excellence through innovation and digitalization, redesigning work, enabling people, and providing expertise.

At Supply Chain Business Analytics Center of Excellence, we are on a mission to ensure everyone can harness the power of data in every decision. Our ambition is to transform and disrupt the SC practice to make it data-driven and digitally enabled to simplify, accelerate and improve the impact of the decision-making processes steering for best-in-class SC performance.

We believe in empowering the business with execution visibility, advanced analytics and with interactive data visualizations from multiple data sources.

Our scope includes all Supply chain processes: Customer Care, Logistics (Warehousing, Distribution and transportation), Supply chain planning (Distribution requirements planning, Demand planning, Integrated Business Planning, Inventory and Supply Planning) and Production/Scheduling Planning, across all Plants, Regions and Markets and for all Business units (GBUs).

You will contribute to empower the life of our patients worldwide by extracting meaning from data and providing tangible and actionable outcomes using the latest available technics and technologies (AI/ML/GenAI).

Join us in this adventure!

Main Responsibilities


Contribute to our forecasting capabilities through enhancements, automatization and expansion of our forecasting cycle. Defining statistical forecast automation strategies based on advanced cloud computing.
Connect externally to bring outside in expertise in new technologies and techniques, and also benchmark
Provide the best possible forecast signal as it drives decisions on the whole supply chain: what/where/when to buy, produce, ship, stock... so that our medicines are available to our patients in time and at the most efficient cost.
Maintain and improve our current forecast engine code base and develop new features to include more statistical or machine-learning based models and algorithms
Lead innovation projects related to the forecasting cycle and related to increasing the impact of our forecasts within the business
Work with GBU Leads to integrate relevant transversal data for advanced predictive models including but not limited to Sinergy, finance promotions, patients, launch plan and indications, internal and external BOS and Economic Trends.
Partner closely with the Digital Team in M&S in support of Global Supply Chain Strategy and Transformation to ensure the current forecast engine is sustained and robust within Sanofi Platforms
Mentor the team on good coding practices
Ensure a best in class and diverse team by leveraging people’s competencies, reinforcing capabilities, developing all supply chain professionals under their remit.
Strive for standardization, simplification & digitization.
Ensure that data is managed/analyzed in compliance with applicable quality, regulatory (Data Privacy, GxP, SOX, etc.) and cybersecurity requirements


About You


Experience: + 8 years’ experience. Have a broad experience with time series forecasting, in particular on the statistical and machine learning models and algorithms. Experience in Data Science related projects. Developing people with new ways of optimizing internal forecasting process and collecting market intelligence. Previous experience improving forecast accuracy by integrating relevant transversal data for advanced predictive models.
Soft skills: Model business problems into data solutions. Ability to understand and interpret forecasting algorithms. Rounded presentation skills; experience in usage of cloud computing technologies and digital platforms within AI framework. Proven leadership in team management and agile project management. High level of emotional intelligence and business integrity; role model for behaviours consistent with our company values. .
Technical skills: program at an advanced level with R and Python. Experience with DevOps/MLOps lifecycle is a plus. SQL, Spark, Docker, AWS experience is a plus.
Education: Degree in Statistics, Computer Engineering, Bioinformatics, Mathematics, Economics or related fields. Master in Supply Chain Management, Engineering or similar preferred. PHD is an asset.
Languages: Fluent in English, and fluency in Spanish and other languages is considered an asset.


Manufacturing & Supply - Leadership Skills


Enterprise Leaders: Are able to have the E2E vision of the business, prioritizing the common interest for the benefit of Sanofi and the patients. Are able to connect the dots for their teams and keep them engaged with the vision.
Transformation Leader: Acts as change management and culture role model to foster employee’s engagement and build a psychologically safe and collaborative workplace.
Decision Maker: Takes timely and data-based decisions in a fast moving and complex environment to drive performance and progress. Promotes an environment where decisions are taken at the right level.
Performance Champion: Embrace digital innovation, AI, GenAI to democratize data and drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance efficiency, quality, safety, and cost effectiveness.
Business Ally: Understand business landscape Industry & business/client groups knowledge to translate the challenges & bring added value. Stay current with global external trends and integrate insights into strategies achieving sustainable competitive advantage.
People Developer: Unleashes the potential of each one and prepares the leaders of the future. Takes bold decisions to ensure the right talents are at the right place.


Pursue progress, discover extraordinary

Better is out there. Better medications, better outcomes, better science. But progress doesn’t happen without people – people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing: a desire to make miracles happen. So, let’s be those people.

At Sanofi, we provide equal opportunities to all regardless of race, colour, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity.

Watch our ALL IN video and check out our Diversity Equity and Inclusion actions at sanofi.com!
Show more

Title: Becas de excelencia Tech (Graduate Program)
Description:
¿Eres un estudiante de ingeniería con una trayectoria sobresaliente y deseas impulsar tu carrera en el ámbito tecnológico? Esta es tu oportunidad para unirte a un programa intensivo y transformador que te permitirá aprender y aplicar los más altos estándares de desarrollo de software en un entorno dinámico e internacional.

Lo que harás:


Desarrollar soluciones de software que impacten a millones de usuarios.
Colaborar en proyectos innovadores que fusionan tecnología y entretenimiento.
Trabajar de la mano con un equipo de alto rendimiento, adoptando las mejores prácticas y estándares de código.



Lo que buscamos:


Estudiantes de cualquier rama de ingeniería, en último año de carrera o recién graduados.
Un rendimiento académico excepcional, situándote entre el top 10% de tu promoción.
Pasión por el aprendizaje continuo y el deseo de crecer en un entorno startup.
Habilidades para trabajar en equipo y adaptarte a contextos internacionales.



Beneficios y condiciones:


Programa de 6 meses con posibilidad de extensión por otros 6 meses.
Posibilidad de contrato indefinido al finalizar la beca, si la experiencia es satisfactoria.
Jornada completa con una compensación competitiva (hasta 24.000€ anuales).
Modalidad presencial en oficinas de Madrid o Barcelona.
Acceso a clases de inglés, seguro médico privado y descuentos exclusivos en planes relacionados con el entretenimiento.



Si estás listo para sumergirte en una experiencia que fusiona tecnología, cultura y entretenimiento, y deseas aprender de un equipo internacional comprometido con la innovación, ¡este Graduate Program es el paso ideal para dar forma a tu futuro profesional!
Show more

Title: Solutions Engineer - AI Startup (Hybrid, Stock Options)
Description:
At UNITH, we're transforming the world of conversational AI. Our "Digital Humans" technology revolutionizes customer interactions with immersive, multilingual AI assistants. With cutting-edge innovation spanning 60+ languages and 600 voices, we're proud to be an ASX-listed leader helping businesses connect with their audiences like never before.

Why Join Us?

Imagine working with a team of talented people from different countries and backgrounds. At UNITH, we're all about teamwork, creativity, and supporting each other to grow. This year, as we expand quickly, you'll have the chance to develop your skills, take on responsibility, and make a real difference.

We care about more than just technical skills, we're looking for people who are excited about what they do and who bring their unique ideas and personality to the team.

The Role: Solutions Engineer

We are looking for a Solutions Engineer who can bridge the gap between Product, Technology, and Sales. This is a critical role where you will play a key part in supporting our sales reps, working on integrations, and ensuring seamless technical solutions for our clients.

What You'll Do



Act as the technical expert in client-facing meetings, supporting our sales team with a deeper technical understanding of our solutions
Work on custom integrations (e.g., Zapier (or similar), Stripe, analytics) to meet client needs; pre and post-sale
Collaborate closely with Product, Engineering, and Sales to ensure smooth solution implementation
Build and maintain relationships with clients, ensuring they get the best possible value from our platform
Troubleshoot and problem-solve complex integration issues, identifying solutions that work for both our business and our clients
Assist in the development and deployment of automation workflows to optimize operations
Provide technical training and support for internal teams and external partners
Create re-usable templates that can be used to streamline sales and client onboarding



What We're Looking For:

We're not just looking for technical skills. The right person will embody our values and fit our team culture.



Customer-Facing Confidence: Able to engage directly with clients explaining technical solutions in a clear and compelling way
Technical Expertise: Strong understanding of API integrations, automation tools, and analytics
Coding experience (Python, JavaScript, or similar) to build or troubleshoot integrations
Strong Problem-Solving Abilities: Comfortable troubleshooting and implementing custom solutions
Proactive & Ownership Mentality: You get things done and take responsibility
Clear Communication: Ability to translate technical details into actionable insights
Team Player: Works well with sales, product, and tech teams
Curiosity & Growth Mindset: Always looking to improve and learn new skills
Adaptability: Able to manage multiple tasks and pivot quickly as priorities change



Bonus Points for



Experience with Zapier, Stripe, analytics platforms, or CRM integrations
Background in pre-sales engineering or technical sales support
Experience working in SaaS environments
Expertise in Prompt engineering



What We Offer



Competitive Compensation: Including salary and Performance Right Shares
Flexibility: Work remotely or join us occasionally at our beautiful Barcelona office with a rooftop terrace
Well-being: Private health insurance with Alan and a ClassPass discount to support your fitness and wellness goals
Global Culture: Join a diverse, international team where your ideas and voice matter
Fun & Connection: Enjoy in-person team events



Ready to Join Us?

If this role excites you, we'd love to hear from you! Please send your resume and a brief message about why you're the perfect fit to anniek@unith.ai. Let's shape the future of conversational AI together!

Diversity & Inclusion

At UNITH, we believe diversity drives innovation. Our mission to transform customer experiences relies on a team with a wide range of perspectives, experiences, and backgrounds. We are committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and empowered to thrive.
Show more

Title: Product Associate - fresh graduate
Description:
Job Description

Do you want to kick-start your career with the world’s first cloud company? Since 1998, Oracle NetSuite has been on a mission to deliver an agile, unified application suite that gives leaders a complete view into their business. Our team is growing, and we’re looking for people like you to help us make a global impact.

As the leading cloud business system, NetSuite includes financials, inventory management, HR, professional services automation, commerce, and more. Tens of thousands of customers all over the world trust NetSuite to give their businesses the visibility, agility, and control needed to make data-informed decisions quickly.

NetSuite is a place where you can build your career and have fun while doing so! We’re invested in our people, our customers, and the community. As part of Oracle, our benefits are second to none. Joining our passionate team means that you’re ready to take your career to the next level. With priceless learning opportunities, strong support, incredible innovation, and volunteer opportunities, NetSuite is committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels empowered and set up for success.

The Program:

This is a rotational program designed to maximize your learning opportunities and find the best match for your skills. You will follow an initial onboarding period followed by a rotation across 2-6 months projects that will expose you to NetSuite's vast product portfolio and some of the specialized crafts that are highly valued in our business and the wider industry.

We are hiring full cycle (4+ years) graduate degree students with a diverse set of skills and experiences to work in and across multiple product teams within Oracle-NetSuite. Our program will introduce you to various aspects of product management and the product development lifecycle. You will have the opportunity to improve your overall learning experience, build your network, and accelerate your chance to create an impact. Our future success depends on hiring world-class, early in career talent who are looking to power next-generation services and solutions.

What You’ll Do:

As a Product Associate, you will


Work with senior product managers, analysts, designers, researchers, engineers, business stakeholders in all parts of product lifecycle from problem discovery, requirements definition, prioritization, delivery and agile development up to release strategy activities.
Conduct discovery activities such as research on market trends, competitive landscape and solution ecosystems.
Conduct quantitative and qualitative analyses to help narrow down problem spaces, considering our customers' business needs.
Design solutions, write use cases, business requirements, and documentation to address problems and opportunities.
Develop, groom, and prioritize backlogs that create the most value for customers, while balancing the investment required from the NetSuite business.
Track dependencies on internal and external collaborators to ensure successful execution.



Minimum Qualifications


Key:
Passion for leveraging technology to improve people's lives.
Knowledge of statistics and tools for analyzing data (SQL, excel, etc.).
Curious attitude: driven to learn, empathize and understand different point-of-views and ways of working.
Positive and resilient personality. You must be open to feedback and have a desire for continuous iteration and improvement.
B2/C1 level in spoken and written English.
Flexibility to collaborate with geographically distributed teams.
Good time management.
Pluses:
Good skills in data visualizations and storytelling.
Python for data processing
Have academic course work, projects, internships, and/or research experience in one or more of the following:
technical areas: Data Structures, Natural Language Processing, AI/ML, Cloud Computing, Information Systems,..
business areas: Business Analytics & Strategy, Economics, Accounting, Inventory Management, Operations, Supply Chain Management, Vendor Management, ECommerce, Marketing, Customer Relationship Management, or any equivalent.

Prerequisites


Having finished or pursuing a full cycle graduate degree program (4+ years) in Computer Science, Engineering Management, Information Systems Management, Business Analytics, or an equivalent field graduating no later than August 2025.
Must join within 12 months of graduating, earliest start date being June 2025.
Degree issued by, or attend a university in the EU/EFTA region
Be willing to work from the office 2-3 days/week.
Authorized to work in Spain in 2025.



Does this sound like you? If so, we hope to meet you!

Career Level - IC2

About Us

As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s problems. True innovation starts with diverse perspectives and various abilities and backgrounds.

When everyone’s voice is heard, we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. It’s why we’re committed to expanding our inclusive workforce that promotes diverse insights and perspectives.

We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.

Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer a highly competitive suite of employee benefits designed on the principles of parity and consistency. We put our people first with flexible medical, life insurance and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.

We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by calling +1 888 404 2494, option one.

Disclaimer:

Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.


Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer

HTML:
Job Description

Do you want to kick-start your career with the world’s first cloud company? Since 1998, Oracle NetSuite has been on a mission to deliver an agile, unified application suite that gives leaders a complete view into their business. Our team is growing, and we’re looking for people like you to help us make a global impact.

As the leading cloud business system, NetSuite includes financials, inventory management, HR, professional services automation, commerce, and more. Tens of thousands of customers all over the world trust NetSuite to give their businesses the visibility, agility, and control needed to make data-informed decisions quickly.

NetSuite is a place where you can build your career and have fun while doing so! We’re invested in our people, our customers, and the community. As part of Oracle, our benefits are second to none. Joining our passionate team means that you’re ready to take your career to the next level. With priceless learning opportunities, strong support, incredible innovation, and volunteer opportunities, NetSuite is committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels empowered and set up for success.

The Program:

This is a rotational program designed to maximize your learning opportunities and find the best match for your skills. You will follow an initial onboarding period followed by a rotation across 2-6 months projects that will expose you to NetSuite's vast product portfolio and some of the specialized crafts that are highly valued in our business and the wider industry.

We are hiring full cycle (4+ years) graduate degree students with a diverse set of skills and experiences to work in and across multiple product teams within Oracle-NetSuite. Our program will introduce you to various aspects of product management and the product development lifecycle. You will have the opportunity to improve your overall learning experience, build your network, and accelerate your chance to create an impact. Our future success depends on hiring world-class, early in career talent who are looking to power next-generation services and solutions.

What You’ll Do:

As a Product Associate, you will

  • Work with senior product managers, analysts, designers, researchers, engineers, business stakeholders in all parts of product lifecycle from problem discovery, requirements definition, prioritization, delivery and agile development up to release strategy activities.
  • Conduct discovery activities such as research on market trends, competitive landscape and solution ecosystems.
  • Conduct quantitative and qualitative analyses to help narrow down problem spaces, considering our customers' business needs.
  • Design solutions, write use cases, business requirements, and documentation to address problems and opportunities.
  • Develop, groom, and prioritize backlogs that create the most value for customers, while balancing the investment required from the NetSuite business.
  • Track dependencies on internal and external collaborators to ensure successful execution.


Minimum Qualifications

  • Key:
    • Passion for leveraging technology to improve people's lives.
    • Knowledge of statistics and tools for analyzing data (SQL, excel, etc.).
    • Curious attitude: driven to learn, empathize and understand different point-of-views and ways of working.
    • Positive and resilient personality. You must be open to feedback and have a desire for continuous iteration and improvement.
    • B2/C1 level in spoken and written English.
    • Flexibility to collaborate with geographically distributed teams.
    • Good time management.
  • Pluses:
    • Good skills in data visualizations and storytelling.
    • Python for data processing
    • Have academic course work, projects, internships, and/or research experience in one or more of the following:
      • technical areas: Data Structures, Natural Language Processing, AI/ML, Cloud Computing, Information Systems,..
      • business areas: Business Analytics & Strategy, Economics, Accounting, Inventory Management, Operations, Supply Chain Management, Vendor Management, ECommerce, Marketing, Customer Relationship Management, or any equivalent.
Prerequisites

  • Having finished or pursuing a full cycle graduate degree program (4+ years) in Computer Science, Engineering Management, Information Systems Management, Business Analytics, or an equivalent field graduating no later than August 2025.
  • Must join within 12 months of graduating, earliest start date being June 2025.
  • Degree issued by, or attend a university in the EU/EFTA region
  • Be willing to work from the office 2-3 days/week.
  • Authorized to work in Spain in 2025.

Title: Junior Application Developer
Description:
¿Quieres llevar tu carrera al siguiente nivel participando en un proyecto que transforma la vida de millones de personas?




Esta oferta te encantará, porque te proporcionará:




Desarrollo Profesional: Trabajarás en proyectos de envergadura con clientes exigentes, lo que hará que tu carrera despegue. Tendrás experiencias únicas y aprenderás constantemente.




Visibilidad y Reconocimiento: Colaborarás con clientes importantes en proyectos complejos, lo que aumentará tu visibilidad en la industria y te hará destacar como un profesional de alto nivel.




Impacto Significativo: Tus aportaciones tendrán un impacto real y significativo, ya que estarás creando aplicaciones que podrán ser utilizadas por miles o millones de personas.




Estabilidad: Una de las cosas que más aprecian nuestros empleados es la estabilidad. No tendrás que preocuparte por tu continuidad laboral; te ofrecemos un entorno de trabajo seguro y estable.







Además, disfrutarás de:




- Gran ambiente de trabajo, ¡Nuestros equipos lo hacen posible!

- Beneficios sociales con nuestra plataforma de Retribución Flexible.

- Estabilidad y proyección de futuro a través del plan de desarrollo profesional.

- Acceso a webinars abiertos y Udemy.

- Certificaciones técnicas/ Gremios.

- 23+2 días de vacaciones (el 24 y el 31 de diciembre)

- Contrato indefinido.

- Concilia Days (días para conciliar tu vida personal con la laboral)













¿Cuál será tu misión?




Tu misión será participar activamente en el desarrollo y mantenimiento de aplicaciones móviles clave para nuestros clientes bancarios. Trabajarás en un equipo dinámico y colaborarás estrechamente con diseñadores, analistas y otros desarrolladores para asegurar la entrega de soluciones de alta calidad y rendimiento.










¿Cómo será tu día a día?




En tu día a día, te enfrentarás a desafíos apasionantes como el desarrollo de nuevas funcionalidades, la optimización de la experiencia de usuario y la resolución de problemas técnicos. Colaborarás en la planificación y estimación de tareas, participarás en reuniones ágiles y tendrás la oportunidad de aportar ideas innovadoras para mejorar nuestros productos móviles.










¿Qué te hará destacar como desarrollador/a mobile?




Destacarás si tienes experiencia minima de 1 año en el desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles nativas (iOS/Android), experiencia en la integración de APIs RESTful, habilidades para la resolución de problemas y una pasión por mantenerse actualizado con las últimas tecnologías y tendencias en el desarrollo móvil. Además, valoramos la capacidad para trabajar en equipo, comunicación efectiva y un enfoque proactivo en la resolución de desafíos técnicos.







IMPRESCINDIBLE RESIDIR EN BARCELONA O ALREDEDORES. (se trata de una posición híbrida, no se admite remoto 100%).

Title: AI Solutions Engineer
Description:
Our opportunity

We are seeking a highly skilled AI Solutions Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in machine learning (ML) and Generative AI, focusing on both the strategic and tactical development of AI solutions. You will architect and deploy advanced AI systems, particularly around Generative AI, leveraging your deep technical expertise to build innovative products, solve complex problems, and guide AI-driven strategies for the business.

Your role

As an AI Solutions Engineer your main responsibilities will involve


Strategy Development: Collaborate with leadership to shape AI/ML strategy, with a specific focus on Conversational AI applications and opportunities that align with company objectives.
Tactical Implementation: Design, build, and deploy AI solutions that drive innovation in product development and operational processes.
Technical Expertise: Develop and optimize generative models for real-world applications; implement MLOps practices to ensure scalable deployment.
Project Leadership: Lead the end-to-end process of AI projects, from ideation and prototyping to production and monitoring, ensuring integration with existing business systems.
Generative AI Product Development: Spearhead the creation and integration of Generative AI models for personalized experiences, content generation, or other innovative use cases in product development.
Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, engineers, and product teams to implement robust generative models, ensuring smooth integration into the product lifecycle.
Emerging Technologies: Stay updated with the latest trends in Generative AI continuously bringing new ideas for AI-driven innovation.
Mentorship: Provide guidance and technical mentorship to junior engineers on AI/ML best practices, with a focus on AI technologies.


Your Skills And Experience

As an AI Solutions Engineer your skills and qualifications will ideally include:

Required Qualifications:


Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field (PhD preferred).
5+ years of experience in building and deploying machine learning models, with proven experience in Generative AI.
Expertise in Python and ML frameworks, and deep learning architectures for generative models.
Proven experience in cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure for AI solution deployment.
Experience in developing products utilizing Generative AI models, such as image generation, natural language generation, or synthetic data generation.
Strong understanding of ML algorithms (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning) and Generative AI techniques.
Experience in scaling generative models and deploying them in production environments.
Excellent communication skills to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Preferred Qualifications:


Experience in NLP, computer vision, and deploying large language models (LLMs) for content generation.
Hands-on experience with fine-tuning LLMs.
Experience with MLOps frameworks and version control of models.
Knowledge of product design principles using AI and ability to drive cross-functional AI projects with a generative component.


What we offer?

As well as a competitive salary and a yearly bonus we offer:


Over 300 euros to set up your home office and additional monthly home office allowance
Wide range of internal and external trainings, including free English, German and Spanish classes depending on the needs
Ticket restaurant or flexibility to exchange it for other benefits
Life, accident, and Health Insurance
Collective Life Retirement Plan
2000 referral bonus if you bring other talented people like you
Special banking and insurance conditions plus Exclusive Employees discounts
Functional diversity benefits
Events: summer and Christmas party, different activities like hiking, investment, beach volley club and many more
No dress code


Primary work location is Barcelona, Poblenou. Please apply with your CV in English.

Who We Are

Looking for a challenging and inspiring work environment where you can make a difference? At Zurich millions of individuals and businesses place their trust in our products and services every day. Our 53,000 employees worldwide form the basis of our success, enabling, businesses and communities to face a world of risk with confidence. Imagine if you could help people do this all over the world. You’d give them confidence and reassurance by protecting what they love most. It’s a big challenge, but you will be supported by a world-class team who believe in helping you to reach your full potential and deliver on our promises.

Diversity & Inclusion

At Zurich we are an equal opportunity employer. We attract and retain the best qualified individuals available, without regard to race/ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age or disability.

So be challenged. Be inspired. Help us make a difference.

Why Zurich

At Zurich, we like to think outside the box and challenge the status quo. We take an optimistic approach by focusing on the positives and constantly asking What can go right?

We are an equal opportunity employer who knows that each employee is unique - that’s what makes our team so great!

Join us as we constantly explore new ways to protect our customers and the planet.


Location(s): ES - Barcelona
Schedule: Full Time
Recruiter name: Laura Santamaría Rodríguez

Title: Machine Learning & AI Engineer
Description:
MISION:




Estamos buscando un ML engineer para colaborar dentro de nuestro equipo de Big Data y Analítica Avanzada en AXA España, actualmente integrado por Data Scientists y ML Engineers. Buscamos personas con gran solidez técnica que tengan ganas de formar parte de un equipo dinámico e innovador apasionado por el desarrollo de soluciones de IA enfocadas a la generación de valor al negocio.




TAREAS / ACTIVIDADES PRINCIPALES:




Como ML Engineer dentro del equipo de Big Data y Analítica Avanzada, serás el encargado de desarrollar soluciones productivas de ML, IA y GenAI optimizando los recursos disponibles en nuestro stack tecnológico según las especificaciones de cada caso de uso. Serás responsable de definir los requisitos técnicos y de datos necesarios para los casos de uso, implementar la preparación de datos y la modelización y/o el uso de LLMs necesario para darles respuesta y asegurar su puesta en producción siguiendo la metodología MLOps en todas las fases del desarrollo de soluciones de IA. Para asegurar el éxito en el desarrollo de soluciones, necesitarás además:




Trabajar mano a mano con los Data Scientists, arquitectos y desarrolladores software involucrados en el desarrollo de casos de uso de IA.
Colaborar en la definición y el desarrollo del despliegue de la metodología MLOps dentro del equipo.
Estar al tanto de todos los avances en el ámbito de la IA y la metodología MLOps para asegurar que mantenemos nuestros flujos y pipelines de desarrollo y ejecución acordes al estado del arte en cuanto a tecnología y buenas prácticas.




PERFIL:




Cualificaciones necesarias:




Licenciatura en matemáticas, estadística, física o ingeniería en informática, telecomunicación (o similares).
+5 años de experiencia en el desarrollo de soluciones software.
Dominio en Python.
Experiencia en el desarrollo en entornos Big Data con Spark/PySpark.
Experiencia en ML, Data Science y desarrollo de soluciones de IA generativa.
Experiencia en el desarrollo y despliegue de soluciones siguiendo la metodología MLOps: productivización de código y generación de librerías, despliegue, gestión y monitorización de modelos y procesos de integración continua.
Inglés: Avanzado




Cualificaciones deseables:




Máster en IA, ML, Data Science o equivalente.
Experiencia en el desarrollo de modelos de deep learning y los frameworks asociados (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.).
Experiencia en el uso de frameworks de IA generativa como LangChain o LlamaIndex.
Experiencia en el uso de distintos LLMs tanto propietarios como open source (Llama, OpenAI, Mistral, etc.).
Experiencia en el desarrollo de soluciones de IA en Microsoft Azure.
Experiencia en el uso de Databricks.




En AXA promovemos activamente la Diversidad e Inclusión ofreciendo igualdad de oportunidades. Se valorará positivamente la posesión de certificado de Discapacidad.







¿A qué estás esperando? ¡Únete a la familia AXA y contribuye al progreso de la sociedad!

  • Experiencia en el desarrollo de modelos de deep learning y los frameworks asociados (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.).
  • Experiencia en el uso de frameworks de IA generativa como LangChain o LlamaIndex.
  • Experiencia en el uso de distintos LLMs tanto propietarios como open source (Llama, OpenAI, Mistral, etc.).
  • Experiencia en el desarrollo de soluciones de IA en Microsoft Azure.
  • Experiencia en el uso de Databricks.


En AXA promovemos activamente la Diversidad e Inclusión ofreciendo igualdad de oportunidades. Se valorará positivamente la posesión de certificado de Discapacidad.



¿A qué estás esperando? ¡Únete a la familia AXA y contribuye al progreso de la sociedad!

Title: Data Scientist (Junior)
Description:
We are growing our data science team to help Tendam solve challenging problems from the retail fashion industry. We are now seeking a Data Scientist for a unique opportunity of impacting the way the world experiences fashion.

What you will do

Decompose complex data problems and conduct rigorous analysis and evaluations

Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data

Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.

Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets

Present information using data visualization techniques

What we are looking for

Scientific background with computational and analytical skills

Strong problem-solving skills

Programming skills with Python and SQL

Understanding and experience with big data systems, especially with Spark (PySpark)

Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, regression, decision trees, neural networks, etc.)

Experience with data visualization tools and packages

A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

~1 year of industry experience

Extra qualifications

Experience working with huge amounts of data

Experience with cloud based web services (e.g., AWS)

Knowledge and experience with a version control system (e.g. Git).

Why Tendam

One of the largest customer data repositories in industry: more than 20M Club members

Working with multiple different data sources: purchases, marketing campaigns, products, web navigation, apps, etc.

Working with cutting edge technologies and building machine learning models to solve real world problems: have a real impact in the business!

Ability to immediately test the model results in real pilots: quick time to market!

Exposure to agile methodologies

Working with senior Data Scientists to accelerate your professional development

Working in a challenging and dynamic industry




Ubicación oficinas: Madrid Capital zona Norte accesible en transporte público (metro, cercanías-Renfe y autobuses urbanos e interubanos).

Horario jornada flexible: de lunes a jueves entrada entre las 7:30 y las 9:30h y salida entre las 17h y las 19h, viernes jornada intensiva y flexibleentrada entre las 7:30 y las 9:30h y salida entre las 13h y las 15h.

Contrato indefinido.

Salario de fijo + variable

Incorporación inmediata (entendiendo que si la persona seleccionada está actualmente trabajando en otra empresa, tendrá que dar el preaviso correspondiente y se coordinará una fecha entre ambas partes que pueda cuadrar).

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Para algunas personas, la tecnología es reto, la innovación es pasión, y la posibilidad de cambiar el mundo es una oportunidad.




Somos una consultora tecnológica que ofrece soluciones globales a las necesidades complejas de las empresas desde otro punto de vista. Escuchamos para crear progreso en nuestro mundo, integrando tecnología y conocimiento.




Desde nuestro área de DATA&IA, buscamos incorporar a un/a Científico de Datos para formar parte del equipo. El objetivo será participar en los diferentes proyectos de IA con el desarrollo de modelos de Machine Learning y soluciones de Inteligencia Artificial. Evaluar la calidad y el significado de los datos. Identificando e interpretando las tendencias y patrones del conjunto de los datos.




¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?




Exploración y preparación de datos, asegurando su calidad, integridad y representatividad para la construcción de modelos de Machine Learning.
Desarrollo, entrenamiento y optimización de modelos de IA, aplicando técnicas avanzadas de Machine Learning, Deep Learning y modelado estadístico.
Implementación de soluciones de Inteligencia Artificial en entornos productivos, optimizando el rendimiento y escalabilidad de los modelos.
Investigación y aplicación de nuevas técnicas y algoritmos, explorando metodologías innovadoras para la mejora continua de los modelos y soluciones de IA.
Despliegue y automatización de modelos mediante MLOps y herramientas cloud para facilitar su integración en el ecosistema.




¿En qué perfil pensamos?




2 años de experiencia en proyectos de Inteligencia Artificial
Formación en matemáticas, estadística, informática o similar.
Valorable conocimiento de las siguientes herramientas: Microsoft Azure, programación en Python, R y SQL, conocimiento de LLMs.
Capacidad de trabajo en equipo y buenas habilidades comunicativas.







¿Qué podemos aportarte?




Contrato Indefinido. Creemos en el desarrollo a largo plazo de de nuestros empleados, por eso ofrecemos estabilidad laboral desde el primer día.
Flexibilidad horaria y conciliación. Fomentamos un entorno de trabajo flexible para que puedas equilibrar tu vida personal y profesional. Además, tenemos jornada intensiva los viernes y durante los meses de verano.
Plan de carrera individualizado. Diseñamos un plan de desarrollo profesional para que puedas alcanzar tus metas y crecer dentro de la empresa.
Programa de retribución flexible (Plan de pensiones, seguro de salud....).
Formarás parte de un equipo donde el trabajo conjunto y la comunicación abierta son la clave para nuestro éxito compartido.




Si has llegado hasta aquí... ¡Queremos conocerte!

Title: Junior Front End Developer
Description:
TransPerfect is an established company with a start-up culture seeking creative entrepreneurial people like you to join our team. We’re hiring a Frontend Engineer to join our global team to be responsible for the quality, development, and execution of our software products. If you’re ready to join a growing company and make an immediate impact, we want to hear from you!




You will be joining at TransPerfect – TechOps:

The TransPerfect TechOps team has been a vital part of the company’s success since its formation over 10 years ago – delivering technology and services that have drastically simplified the lives of our clients and colleagues – from workflow improvements for colleagues to core services that form the basis of the company’s GlobalLink platform, to creating scalable client interfaces that allow novice users to navigate complex ecosystems.




https://globallink.transperfect.com/




When applying, please submit your CV in English.




Your responsibilities and tasks will include:

Implement defined features through code development, while also conducting thorough investigations and resolution of bugs
Develop modular, reusable code components to streamline development and maintenance
Utilize front-end frameworks like Vue.js, or Angular to create scalable and reusable UI components
Optimize code and assets to ensure optimal load times and smooth performance
Perform code reviews to uphold quality standards
Collaborate within cross-functional teams to deliver solutions that either adhere to existing standards or establish new ones across departments
Within an agile framework, you'll manage internal and external implementation requirements and expectations through clear communication and effective oversight
Provide constructive feedback to the technical staff during all phases of the software lifecycle to keep development priorities aligned with business needs
Take ownership and drive end-to-end quality software development processes




The minimum we’re looking for (show us what you got if you aren’t a perfect fit):

1-2 years of software development experience
Proficiency in JavaScript
Proven experience working with frontend frameworks such as Vue.js/React/Angular (or similar) and related tools and libraries
Ability to take complex designs from Figma and convert to corresponding HTML/CSS/JS code
Experience/knowledge of Agile methodologies like SCRUM/Kanban
Knowledge of SOLID principles
Knowledge of clean code practices
Ability to work with complex enterprise software architectures
Excellent communication and collaboration skills with a proven ability to work effectively in a team environment




By applying, I confirm I have read and accepted TransPerfect's Privacy Policy: https://www.transperfect.com/about/data-privacy-recruiting




Work model:

This position is intended to be largely in-office with a focus on flexibility. Today, most of the global team is on a hybrid model ranging between 3-4 days in the office per week. We aim to find an inclusive balance between everyone's personal lives and responsibilities and the value created from in-office collaboration. We work with new team members to find that balance with them while building the trust and collaboration that our team values.

We believe that sharing the same physical space with our colleagues creates a level of trust and understanding that fosters innovation and a sense of purpose.

The socializing and relationships formed from these in-person interactions have created the bonds that make our team successful.

We not only want to encourage people to safely spend time in the office, but also, schedule regular travel between our offices in Europe and the US – and a regular conference where the entire worldwide team is gathered together. Maybe the Metaverse will replace the office some day – but it hasn't yet! Online meetings were a powerful connector during the pandemic – but they don't foster the same connection.

Title: Data Scientist - Sports Technology
Description:
The Sports Security team ensures that all EA Sports products are developed with the security and gameplay integrity of our players as a top priority. We partner with both platform development teams and game studios to ensure that security and game integrity issues are identified and resolved throughout the application and service lifecycle.

You will be a member of the Sports Security Data team reporting to the Lead Data Scientist. You will work with the team in developing excellent models to keep our games fair, fun, and free of cheaters.

We support hybrid work, and you will work two days per week in our Vancouver office.

Responsibilities:

As a Data Scientist on our Sports Security Data team, you will be a part of a global security team and will work with game and central tech development teams to:

Work with team members across multiple disciplines to understand the data behind game features, user behaviors, the security landscape, and our goals.
Analyze data from several large sources, then automate solutions using scheduled processes, models, and alerts.
Work with partners to design and improve metrics that guide our decisions by summarizing the state of game security.
Detect patterns associated with fraudulent accounts and anomalous behavior.
Solve scientific problems and create new methods independently.
Translate requirements and security questions into data insights.
Set up alerting mechanisms so our leadership is always aware of the security posture.

Qualifications:

Postgraduate degree, with specialization in machine learning, artificial intelligence, statistics, or related fields, or 2+ years of equivalent work experience in applied machine learning and analytics.
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases.
Proficiency in Python programming.
Familiarity with statistics, modeling, and data visualization.
Experience with online gaming and an interest in addressing cheating issues.

EXPERIENCE

Experience building statistical and machine learning models, applying techniques such as regression, classification, clustering, and anomaly detection.
Experience with Visualization tools and libraries such as Tableau, Looker, or Matplotlib.
Familiarity with Big Data tools such as Hadoop, Spark, or Splunk.
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP or Azure.
Some experience to software development or data engineering.
Analyze business problems or research questions, identify relevant data points, and extract meaningful insights.
Experience or familiarity with security concepts, including network/software security, security data, and attack vectors.
