Title: Marketing Data Scientist
Description:
We have an exciting opportunity for you to join our team as a Marketing Data Scientist.

Who We Are

FedEx is the largest express transportation company in the world, connecting more than 220 countries and territories. We work every moment to deliver the most important package of someone’s day. Our team of passionate people know their day-to-day work is invaluable in delivering outstanding experience to our customers. 530,000 team members strong, we are as diverse as the world we serve. We love what we do, and we do it well. Our reach is big, and so are our dreams. Join us and let's write our next chapter together.

What You Will Be Doing


Develop Data-Driven Insights: Utilize advanced data analysis techniques to extract actionable insights from large and diverse datasets across different European markets, driving strategic marketing decisions and commercial execution optimization.
Utilising ML methods (e.g supervised, unsupervised) on an Azure platform with languages such as Python, build and implement Predictive Models: Design, build, and deploy predictive and machine learning models to identify market trends, customer behaviour, and business process outcomes.
Analyze Multi-Channel Marketing Data: Integrate and analyze data from various marketing channels (e.g., transactional, firmographic, behavioral, digital data from advertising, social media, email campaigns) to assess performance, identify patterns, generate usable segmentations and recommend improvements to amplify future success of activities.
Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Work closely with marketing, sales, and data teams to ensure alignment of data science initiatives with business goals. Enable analysts to further work on data points and reach data-driven recommendations to support in strategic planning and decision-making processes.
Ensure compliance to the Machine Learning Lifecycle from Data gathering through to Deployment. Appropriate checks and balances along with sufficient validation steps should be incorporated to maintain Data Quality and Compliance (e.g. GDPR and internal data governance policies)


What Do You Bring With You

The ideal candidate would demonstrate:


Advanced Data Analysis and Modeling: Proficiency in statistical analysis and machine learning techniques, with experience in coding with Python, R, and SQL along with a good knowledge of Databricks is important. Knowledge of tools like Power BI for translating data into insights is a benefit.
Experience with Marketing Analytics: Strong background in analyzing and interpreting marketing data, with knowledge of marketing metrics, customer segmentation, and business performance evaluation.
Multi-Channel Data Integration: Expertise in integrating and analyzing data from various sources, including digital marketing platforms, CRM systems, large transactional databases, to create in depth intelligent views of customer cohorts.
Strong Communication Skills: Ability to clearly communicate complex data findings and insights to non-technical stakeholders, including creating detailed reports, visualizations, and presentations.
Cross-Cultural and Regional Awareness: Understanding of the nuances and variations in marketing practices and consumer behavior across different European markets, with the ability to adapt strategies to diverse regional needs.


What Do We Offer


Attractive compensation package
Training to get you started and on-the-job learning opportunities
Extensive learning resources to further develop your skills and knowledge
Tuition Assistance Program (*applicable for FedEx positions with a permanent contract)
Employee Assistance Program for you and your family in difficult life situations
Employee reduced-rate shipping
Great career opportunities
FedEx is one of the worlds most admired companies and trusted brands year after year


Bring your ideas, individuality, and dreams to our global community. Feel good about where you work. Choose your career path - we’re ready to invest in your development. Join FedEx.


Show more

Title: Data Scientist (NLP Deep Learning Engineer)
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, and more freedom. Since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. Our powerhouse of products — including spending, saving, investing, exchanging, travelling, and more — help our 50+ million customers get more from their money every day.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‌ 2 things are essential to our success: our people and our culture. In recognition of our outstanding employee experience, we've been certified as a Great Place to Work™. So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our offices and remotely, to help us achieve our mission. And we're looking for more brilliant people. People who love building great products, redefining success, and turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

Deep Learning Engineers at Revolut are at the forefront of GenAI and LLM integration, building transformative products that range from user-facing tools to advanced process optimisation and data understanding solutions. You’ll work with the most advanced LLMs available out there, developing solutions that have a tangible impact on millions of Revolut customers worldwide.

As a Deep Learning Engineer, you’ll be embedded in dynamic, cross-functional teams with Product Owners, Software Engineers, Data Analysts, and Operations Managers. Together, you’ll solve complex problems and deliver automated, scalable solutions that continually improve. This role offers the opportunity to collaborate with top-tier professionals in Product, Design, Engineering, and AI to shape the future of Revolut’s AI-driven capabilities.

Our projects span the creation of personal assistants, intelligent chatbots, copilots, and more, all designed to elevate user experience and revolutionise customer interaction. We experiment, iterate, and build intelligent systems that improve over time through advanced algorithms and deep learning techniques.

What You’ll Be Doing


Building AI-driven features from scratch like personal assistants, chatbots, copilots and more.
Developing user-focused and backend features using deep learning
Delivering impactful, scalable, data-driven AI solutions
Collaborating with Product, Engineering, and Data teams to solve deep learning challenges
Integrating cutting-edge AI technologies to drive innovation at Revolut


What You'll Need


Experience in Deep Learning within Natural Language Processing area and Large Language Models
A Bachelor's degree in a STEM major (mathematics, computer science, engineering)
Excellent knowledge of data science (python, SQL) and production tools
A deep understanding of probability and statistics fundamentals
Big picture thinking to correctly diagnose problems and productionising research
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to partner with Product Owners and business heads


Nice to have


A master's or PhD in a quantitative discipline
Strong experience with additional programming languages, such as Java, Scala, C++
Experience at a large tech company worth >$15B
School/University Olympic medal competitions in physics, maths, economics or programming


Building a global financial super app isn’t enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that’s why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We’re doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That’s why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Important notice for candidates:

Job scams are on the rise. Please keep these guidelines in mind when applying for any open roles.


Only apply through official Revolut channels. We don’t use any third-party services or platforms for our recruitment.
Always double-check the emails you receive. Make sure all communications are being done through official Revolut emails, with an @revolut.com domain.


We won't ask for payment or personal financial information during the hiring process. If anyone does ask you for this, it’s a scam. Report it immediately.

By submitting this application, I confirm that all the information given by me in this application for employment and any additional documents attached hereto are true to the best of my knowledge and that I have not wilfully suppressed any material fact. I confirm I have disclosed if applicable any previous employment with Revolut. I accept that if any of the information given by me in this application is in any way false or incorrect, my application may be rejected, any offer of employment may be withdrawn or my employment with Revolut may be terminated summarily or I may be dismissed. By submitting this application, I agree that my personal data will be processed in accordance with Revolut's <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Candidate Privacy Notice
Show more

Together, you’ll solve complex problems and deliver automated, scalable solutions that continually improve. This role offers the opportunity to collaborate with top-tier professionals in Product, Design, Engineering, and AI to shape the future of Revolut’s AI-driven capabilities.

Our projects span the creation of personal assistants, intelligent chatbots, copilots, and more, all designed to elevate user experience and revolutionise customer interaction. We experiment, iterate, and build intelligent systems that improve over time through advanced algorithms and deep learning techniques.

What You’ll Be Doing

  • Building AI-driven features from scratch like personal assistants, chatbots, copilots and more.
  • Developing user-focused and backend features using deep learning
  • Delivering impactful, scalable, data-driven AI solutions
  • Collaborating with Product, Engineering, and Data teams to solve deep learning challenges
  • Integrating cutting-edge AI technologies to drive innovation at Revolut

What You'll Need

  • Experience in Deep Learning within Natural Language Processing area and Large Language Models
  • A Bachelor's degree in a STEM major (mathematics, computer science, engineering)
  • Excellent knowledge of data science (python, SQL) and production tools
  • A deep understanding of probability and statistics fundamentals
  • Big picture thinking to correctly diagnose problems and productionising research
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills to partner with Product Owners and business heads

Nice to have

  • A master's or PhD in a quantitative discipline
  • Strong experience with additional programming languages, such as Java, Scala, C++
  • Experience at a large tech company worth >$15B
  • School/University Olympic medal competitions in physics, maths, economics or programming

Building a global financial super app isn’t enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that’s why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We’re doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That’s why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Important notice for candidates:

Job scams are on the rise. Please keep these guidelines in mind when applying for any open roles.

  • Only apply through official Revolut channels. We don’t use any third-party services or platforms for our recruitment.
  • Always double-check the emails you receive. Make sure all communications are being done through official Revolut emails, with an @revolut.com domain.

We won't ask for payment or personal financial information during the hiring process. If anyone does ask you for this, it’s a scam. Report it immediately.

By submitting this application, I confirm that all the information given by me in this application for employment and any additional documents attached hereto are true to the best of my knowledge and that I have not wilfully suppressed any material fact. I confirm I have disclosed if applicable any previous employment with Revolut. I accept that if any of the information given by me in this application is in any way false or incorrect, my application may be rejected, any offer of employment may be withdrawn or my employment with Revolut may be terminated summarily or I may be dismissed. By submitting this application, I agree that my personal data will be processed in accordance with Revolut's <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Candidate Privacy Notice

Title: Senior Scientist | Mathematical & Physics Signals Modeling | Experimental Interface | Deep Tech | Healthtech Startup
Description:
Company Description

Hello!

We're looking for an exceptional Senior Scientist with expertise in theoretical and computational modeling to join our research team on our journey to revolutionize personalized medicine . If you're a physicist, mathematician, or physical chemist who loves bridging the gap between theory and experiment, we want to hear from you!

iLoF in a nutshell

As personalized medicine becomes the norm, scientists, patients, and healthcare systems worldwide face massive barriers in providing the right treatment to the right patient.

Recognized by CB Insights and Financial Times as one of the most promising Digital Health companies in the world, iLoF is building an AI-powered breakthrough platform capable of transforming precision medicine.

Our goal is to become the platform that democratizes access to personalized medicine for millions of people living with complex diseases around the globe.

Thanks to our proprietary optical fingerprint library of disease biomarkers and biological profiles we can offer personalized patient screening and stratification in a faster and more affordable way, saving up to 40% of the cost and 70% of the time while enabling a more human patient experience.

Supported by leading institutions like Microsoft Ventures, Mayfield, or the Oxford University, iLoF is currently focusing on a validated platform technology in one of the biggest epidemics of our times: Alzheimer's, while maintaining ongoing verticals on Digestive Cancer, Stroke, and Infectious diseases.

Our Team‍

We are a mix of scientists, entrepreneurs, and inventors based in Oxford and Porto, with a passion for healthcare!

Recognized by CB Insights as one of the most promising Digital Health companies in the world and by the Financial Times as a Transformational Business in Healthcare, iLoF has been regularly featured in leading outlets like Tech Crunch, Wired, and Sifted and listed as a rising star in AI-Driven Drug Discovery, Health Screening & Data Analytics.

Stuff you wanna know :

What We Value


A Be Kind attitude is the main guideline within iLoF
A hand in the hammer and another free to support your co-workers as a true team player
An Honest and Egoless attitude towards discussions and critics working in good faith
The braveness to speak your heart in any situation
Through words or actions be always sure to make a difference at any moment!
Understanding that everyone has an identity outside of work and must be respected (work-life balance)
Be proud to drive your responsibilities to success and help others do the same, embracing ownership!


Perks


A bright future at a promising high-tech startup company
Annual performance bonus
Stock Options
A flexible environment and work-life balance: adaptable working hours, strong remote work culture
A stimulating atmosphere with room for creativity - fast-paced, fun, and energetic startup with a friendly culture
Weekly happy hours with amazing food and drinks
Company offsites ⛱️
Free coffee and snacks ☕
Private healthcare insurance
The opportunity to work with a world
class, talented team: and potentially change healthcare as we know it for millions of patients living with complex diseases around the globe ‍♂️


We share a passion for being part of a mission that matters, and we are always looking for curious and collaborative people who share our values and want to be part of our journey.

If that sounds like a fit for you, click the apply button and join us.

Job Description

We are looking for a Senior Scientist with expertise in theoretical and computational modeling to join our research team. In this role, you will develop mathematical frameworks, computational simulations, and analytical methods to describe complex physical systems, working closely with experimentalists and interdisciplinary scientists to validate and refine your models. Your insights will directly influence experimental design, data interpretation, and technology development, ensuring a tight loop between theory and practice.

If you are a scientist who enjoys bridging the gap between theory and experiment, with a passion for developing models that have real-world impact, this is the perfect opportunity to push the boundaries of physical science while working in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.

About Your Role | What Will You Be Doing?


Develop and refine mathematical models for complex physical systems targeting personalized medicine, ensuring their applicability to real-world experiments.
Work closely with experimental teams, translating theoretical predictions into testable hypotheses and guiding data collection/analysis.
Apply analytical and computational techniques, including simulations and numerical modeling, to study physical phenomena.
Utilize statistical physics, quantum mechanics, and applied mathematics to extract meaningful insights from experimental data.
Assist in analysing and interpreting experimental data, ensuring that theoretical expectations align with practical feasibility.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in physics, computational modeling, and advances in spectroscopy for clinical applications.
Communicate findings effectively across disciplines, ensuring alignment between theoretical and experimental efforts.
Contribute to research publications, patents, and presentations at leading conferences.


Requirements ✔️


Strong expertise in theoretical and computational physics or applied mathematics, with a demonstrated ability to apply these concepts to real-world experiments in an interdisciplinary setting.
Proven experience working at the interface of theory and experiment, collaborating with experimentalists, interdisciplinary scientists and engineers.
Proficiency in numerical modeling, simulations, and data analysis using Python, Julia, or similar tools.
Ability to develop and implement physical models, differential equations, and computational frameworks to solve complex problems.
Experience with data-driven approaches, signal processing, or machine learning for scientific applications is a plus.
A deep curiosity for solving interdisciplinary challenges, with an innovative and problem-solving mindset.
Excellent communication skills, capable of translating complex theoretical concepts into practical applications and to non-specialists in a clear engaging way.
Proven track record of scientific publications in peer-reviewed journals or major scientific conferences.


Qualifications


PhD or Msc in Physics, Applied Mathematics, Theoretical Physics, Physical Chemistry, Mathematics, or a related field. Exceptional candidates with a Master’s degree and extensive research experience will also be considered.
+3 years of experience in academia or industry, working on modelling and simulations with experimental applications.
Experience in developing theories/models that have been tested in experimental setups.
Previous collaboration with experimental physicists, engineers, or applied scientists.
Experience supervising junior researchers is welcome but not required.


This is a unique opportunity to work on high-impact projects at the intersection of theory and experiment, developing models that shape cutting-edge technology and scientific discoveries. If this excites you, we’d love to hear from you!

Additional Information

Perks


A bright future at a promising high-tech startup company
Annual performance bonus
Stock Options
A flexible environment:adaptable working hours, strong remote work culture
A stimulating atmosphere with room for creativity - fast-paced, fun, and energetic startup with a friendly culture
Weekly happy hours with amazing food and drinks
Company offsites ⛱️
Free coffee and snacks ☕
Private healthcare insurance
The opportunity to work with a world
class, talented team: and potentially change healthcare as we know it for millions of patients living with complex diseases around the globe ‍♂️


We share a passion for being part of a mission that matters, and we are always looking for curious and collaborative people who share our values and want to be part of our journey.

If that sounds like a fit for you, click the apply button and join us.

You’ve read all this way but you’re missing a skill or two?

No problem, it’s our job to up-skill you to take your career to the next level. What we’re trying to say is, don’t be afraid to apply if you don’t tick all the boxes.

Tags:

Mathematical modeling, computational physics, applied mathematics, signal processing, statistical analysis, Bayesian inference, spectroscopy, optical signal processing, biomedical optics, light-based sensing, multispectral and hyperspectral analysis, biomedical signal processing, health tech, personalized medicine, non-invasive diagnostics, biomarker discovery, machine learning, deep learning, AI, predictive analytics, model optimization, data engineering, Python, MATLAB, TensorFlow, PyTorch, SciPy, NumPy, Scikit-learn, cloud computing, HPC, data pipelines, translational science, interdisciplinary research, computational biology, biophotonics, medical device development.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Portugal)
Description:
We are a small consulting firm specializing in the retail and supply chain sectors. Our team leverages advanced data analytics to provide actionable insights for our clients. We are looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our dynamic team and contribute to our mission of delivering data-driven solutions by helping us discover the information hidden in large amounts of data and help extract valuable business insights for our clients. The candidate should have a strong background in statistics, keen sense of programming, machine learning and data visualization to effectively share the found insights in a clear manner.




Your primary focus will be on data cleansing, processing, applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, building high quality prediction systems, identify questions, create new algorithms and drawing conclusions from the analysis.




In this role, you should be highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statistics. We are looking for someone with an engaging communication style with confidence in interpreting numerical information, and a genuine curiosity and enthusiasm for understanding the markets/clients.




A self-starter with an inquisitive nature and would want to look beyond the obvious to explore why things are there. Critical and conceptual thinking and problem-solving skills are essential alongside passion for machine-learning and research.

 

About us

ebp Global is a rapidly growing, high-performing boutique consultancy firm best known for delivering world-class impactful solutions to our clients’ most complex problem. Our expertise cover retail strategy, organisational design, supply chain and fulfilment, technology planning, analytics, digital transformation, as well as technology development. 

 

We offer an inspiring seamless working environment and dynamic career opportunities help you to develop both personally and professionally.




Responsibilities

Lead the development and implementation of advanced analytical models and machine learning algorithms.           
Oversee data analysis projects from start to finish, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
Partner with clients to identify business challenges and provide strategic insights.
Mentor and guide junior data scientists.
Utilize Python, SQL, and Azure to deliver challenging projects with a robust commercial approach including but not limited to
Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis
Undertaking the pre-processing of structured and unstructured data
Selecting features, building, and optimizing models using machine learning techniques
Correlating disparate data
Data mining using state-of-the-art methods
Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems
Analyse large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns
Deliver high quality actionable insights by performing ad hoc analysis to predict, measure and interpret business trends.
Ability to build/amend Python APIs and machine-learning algorithms to support and deliver solutions to the clients.
Clearly and concisely communicate data science insights that engage and influence both technical as well as non / less technical audiences.
Create highly visual insights to support storytelling and visualization for the clients




Skills and Qualifications

Master's degree or PhD in a quantitative field (e.g., Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering) and minimum 5 years working in a Data Science environment
Demonstrable programming experience in Python for data science and machine learning 
Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and their applications in data science
Proficient in Python, SQL, NoSQL databases
Experience with version control like Git
Experience with common data science toolkits (NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Pandas, IPython, TensorFlow, PyTorch etc.) and Scikit-Learn highly desirable
Extensive experience of data modelling and database design
A passion for developing and communicating deep and valuable insights
Extensive, demonstrable experience building and testing/validating machine learning models and using data mining techniques
Experience of working in a cloud computing environment, preferably Microsoft Azure
Experience using business intelligence tools (Tableau preferred)
Knowledge of data governance and privacy considerations and principles
Should be fluent in English (written & spoken)




Soft Skills

Analytical mind and business acumen
Strong maths skills (e.g. statistics, algebra, distributions, regression testing)
Problem-solving aptitude is essential
Strong leadership and project management skills.
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Ability to manage multiple projects and deliver results under tight deadlines.
Ability to learn and upgrade technical skills, in the fast-paced data analysis field
Ability to understand and visualize multidimensionality of business facts/measures
Ability to work in a dynamic, agile environment within a geographically distributed team




We are seeking high potential and driven individuals to join our team. Packages will be commensurate with outstanding applicant profiles.




Location: Based in Portugal, with hybrid office/work from home conditions.




Applicants must have the right to work in Portugal.

 

Please send full resume with current and expected salary as well as available date by e-mail to info.eu@ebp-global.com. Only relevant CVs will be contacted.

Show more

Title: Python Developer
Description:
About Waterleau

Waterleau is a global Water Technology Company committed to protect one of our most valuable natural resources: water. We provide solutions for water production, wastewater treatment and water reuse. We will do everything in our power to help industries and municipalities reach their sustainable development goals. We strongly believe that every drop counts.




Passionate about water, we have developed a portfolio of state-of-the-art water technologies and acquired an impressive track record of +2000 references across all continents. Our services include design & build of turnkey plants, technology pack providing as well as outsourced operations and maintenance.




We are looking for...

A Senior Python Developer - Technical Lead to join our compact digital team at Waterleau. As the technical lead, you will be responsible for overseeing the development and implementation of software solutions that support our water technology projects. You will also serve as a reference within our team, providing guidance and expertise to other developers.




Responsibilities

Lead the development from design and architecture to implementation and maintenance, you turn our digital ambitions into reality.
Collaborate with business owners to understand the engineering needs and translate them into practical and durable solutions. You're able to turn business requirements into pragmatic technical solution and communicate your plans to a non-technical audience.
Provide training & feedback to your colleagues. Participate in code reviews and improve code quality. You ensure a stable and durable delivery of code.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices in the Python community. As Senior Python Developer, you are our reference when it comes to all things python. Not only for our application developers, but also for other python users like data engineers and power users.
Mentor junior developers and help them grow their skills. You're responsible for the continuous improvement of your fellow python developers.




Requirements

Expert knowledge of Python programming and experience with web frameworks such as Django or Flask. You have a proven trackrecord in all things python app development.
Solid experience with cloud-based platforms and container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes. Setting up CI/CD pipelines, linters, automated tests, vulnerability screening and using Infrastructure as Code are your second nature. You have experience balancing managed cloud services with self-hosting solutions, selecting the best approach for each use case.
Ability to work independently on complex projects. You deconstruct a complex goal in to manageable parts andhelp your colleagues when they are blocked. You're able to track and report progress in an effective and pragmat way.
Passion for water conservation and sustainability. As a developer, you get the chance to have a significant a positive impact on the world around you. Help solving your colleagues and clients water challenges matter to you.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. You can dive deep into technical issues while maintaining a clear vision of the bigger picture. You are able to find pragmatic solutions without increasing technical debt and the lo term consequences of your choices.
Ability to work in a diverse environment. You are able to work with both in-office and remote colleagues understanding the intricacies of their work. You are proficient in English and can communicate with a variety of nonnative English speakers. An extended knowledge of other languages are always considered as a plus.




What we can offer you

A competitive salary package with great benefit
Opportunity for professional growth and development.
The ability to have a positive and tangible impact on our environment and the world around you.
A role with responsibility and ownership over a platform used by more than a hundred engineers worldwide.
If you are passionate about water conservation, sustainability, and software development, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Show more

  • Mentor junior developers and help them grow their skills. You're responsible for the continuous improvement of your fellow python developers.

  • Expert knowledge of Python programming and experience with web frameworks such as Django or Flask. You have a proven trackrecord in all things python app development.
  • Solid experience with cloud-based platforms and container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes. Setting up CI/CD pipelines, linters, automated tests, vulnerability screening and using Infrastructure as Code are your second nature. You have experience balancing managed cloud services with self-hosting solutions, selecting the best approach for each use case.
  • Ability to work independently on complex projects. You deconstruct a complex goal in to manageable parts andhelp your colleagues when they are blocked. You're able to track and report progress in an effective and pragmat way.
  • Passion for water conservation and sustainability. As a developer, you get the chance to have a significant a positive impact on the world around you. Help solving your colleagues and clients water challenges matter to you.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. You can dive deep into technical issues while maintaining a clear vision of the bigger picture. You are able to find pragmatic solutions without increasing technical debt and the lo term consequences of your choices.
  • Ability to work in a diverse environment. You are able to work with both in-office and remote colleagues understanding the intricacies of their work. You are proficient in English and can communicate with a variety of nonnative English speakers. An extended knowledge of other languages are always considered as a plus.


What we can offer you

  • A competitive salary package with great benefit
  • Opportunity for professional growth and development.
  • The ability to have a positive and tangible impact on our environment and the world around you.
  • A role with responsibility and ownership over a platform used by more than a hundred engineers worldwide.
  • If you are passionate about water conservation, sustainability, and software development, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
🤔Who are we?




As the founding entity of RAINBOW PARTNERS, Quanteam is a consulting firm specializing in the fields of Banking, Finance, and Financial Services. Guided by our core values of closeness, teamwork, diversity, and excellence, our team of 980 expert consultants, representing 35 different nationalities, collaborates across 12 international offices: Paris, Lyon, New York, Montreal, London, Brussels, Geneva, Lisbon, Porto, Casablanca, Madrid and Singapore. Committed to sustainability (Ecovadis Gold), diversity (gender index: 92%), and quality of work life (Best Workplace Experience), Quanteam is a forward-thinking enterprise.




🚀 Our Expertise




With a dual expertise in both business and IT, Quanteam supports its corporate clients (investment banks, asset management companies, private and retail banks, custodians, etc.) across the entire Front-to-Back spectrum in evolving their business activities and transformation projects.




Our teams are organized into 5 expertise areas:

➡ Quantitative Finance

➡ Risk, Compliance, and Regulatory

➡ Operations and Finance

➡ Transformation and Organization

➡ Information Systems

In 2023, Quanteam generated a revenue of €74.6 million.




🔎We are looking for a Python Developer




MAIN TASKS:

Contribute to ongoing projects by utilizing Python 3 and relevant packages.
Act as a backup for the Tech Leader by gathering knowledge and contributing to the team.
Develop and maintain Python applications using frameworks like Django, Jinja2, and others.
Implement solutions with SQL, ensuring effective database management and optimization.
Collaborate with the team and contribute effectively in a team-oriented environment.
Follow CI/CD practices using tools like Jenkins, XLRelease, XLDeploy, and JFrog.




YOUR PROFILE AND SKILLS:

Several years of experience in Python development (Python 3).
Proficiency with Python packages and frameworks, including:
Requests
Pandas
Django
Jinja2
PyODBC
SQLAlchemy
XML
BeautifulSoup4
JSON
Strong SQL skills with experience in database management.
Knowledge of GIT for version control.
Experience with CI/CD practices and tools (Jenkins, XLRelease, XLDeploy, JFrog).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Experience with PowerShell scripting and batch file scripting.
Knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, or Angular.
Experience with Powercenter Informatica or similar ETL tools.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
Fluent in English.
Hybrid role based in Porto.







🚀If you feel this opportunity is for you, send your CV and join our team!

Title: Gen AI Developer
HTML:
Syffer is an all-inclusive consulting company focused on talent, tech and innovation. We exist to elevate companies and humans all around the world, making change, from the inside to the outside.

We believe that technology + human kindness positively impacts every community around the world. Our approach is simple, we see a world without borders, and believe in equal opportunities. We are guided by our core principles of spreading positivity, good energy and promote equality and care for others.

Our hiring process is unique! People are selected by their value, education, talent and personality. We dont present ethnicity, religion, national origin, age, gender, sexual orientation or identity.

Its time to burst the bubble, and we will do it together!

What You'll do:

  • Lead the development of multiple technical solutions focused on Generative AI, from PoC to deployment;
  • Ensure high-quality standards for AI solutions by adopting the most suitable tools and frameworks, as well as implementing best practices, such as robust testing, validation, and performance evaluation processes;
  • Guide and mentor junior developers, guiding them through the AI development lifecycle, ensuring a good collaboration and high-quality deliverables;
  • Engage with business stakeholders to define the technical direction of projects;
  • Support the deployment of AI models in production environments, ensuring ongoing monitoring, optimization, and update;
  • Collaborate with software developers, MLOps and DevOps to ensure seamless integration of AI modules into successful applications.


What You Are:

  • Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field;
  • Strong and foundational knowledge on Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Generative AI;
  • At least 5 years of experience in full-stack machine learning in complex and long-term projects, from conception to deployment, with focus on modular and scalable architectures;
  • Experience in developing and deploying LLM-based solution is highly valued;
  • Proficiency in programming in Python and using frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch and LangChain;
  • Hands-on experience with cloud services, such as Azure or AWS;
  • Experience with services such as API Gateway, Lambda, ECS, DynamoDB, OpenAI, BedRock and related ones is highly valued;
  • Experience in building and integrating RESTful APIs and microservices;
  • Experience in establishing and promoting best practices in software engineering, such as code reviews, automated testing, version control (Git), and Agile methodologies;
  • Excellent problem-solving, communication and mentoring skills;
  • Fluency in English, both written and spoken;
  • Hybrid Work Model.


What youll get:

  • Wage according to candidate's professional experience;
  • Remote Work whenever possible;
  • Allocation of health insurance from the beginning of the employment;
  • Delivery of work equipment adjusted to the performance of functions;
  • And others.


Work together with expert teams on projects of large magnitude and intensity, long term together with our clients, all leaders in their industries.

Are you ready to step into a diverse and inclusive world with us?

Together we will promote uniquess!

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




Decskill Talent: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.
Decskill Boost: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.
Decskill Connect: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.




At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are looking for a Python Developer for a hybrid project based in Oporto.




Key Responsibilities

· Create / maintain Python and deploy web applications using Django.

· Create / maintain Python scripts that collect monitoring data and provide task automation

· Perform code review.

· Optimize and refactor existing code.

· Work with other engineers to containerize applications to deploy on Kubernetes and Docker.

· Perform routine maintenance on our various monitoring platforms.

Required Experience

· 2+ years of Python Web development using Django and Asyncio framework.

· Advanced knowledge of Git / Gitlab.

· Advanced knowledge of setting up Highly Available application using technologies like load balancers Nginx/ Keepalived.

· Knowledge of multithreading concepts.

· Good understanding of MySQL databases.

· Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

· Good communication skills.

· Team player.

Desirable Qualifications

· Experience operating python applications in Docker / Kubernetes

· Experience deploying applications into public cloud.

· Development on Uvicorn / Gunicorn.

· Experience of work with JavaScript. Our existing applications has backend on Python and frontend on JavaScript.

· AWS / GCP experience.

· Understand and experience working with messaging systems (Kafka, Redis).




If you’re interested in this job please send your CV in english to liliana.moreira@decskill.com with reference LM/Py.




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: QAE
Description:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

We are looking for an Amazing: QAE

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Remote from Portugal. The candidates must be in Europe.

The amazing you, will have:


Strong experience in testing or development in a commercial environment
Experience in developing or maintaining an automation framework
Previous experience with Cypress and Playwright
Experience programming in TypeScript
Knowledge of RESTful APIs
Good understanding of testing methodologies
Fluent in written and spoken English nice to have
Good understanding of cloud computing
Previous experience testing Lambda functions
ISTQB Foundation certification.




Why should you become part of our family?


You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!


Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote



Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

At KCS IT we defend equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for all employees!

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit.

All applications with skills for the role are welcome!

Title: Python Developer
Description:
A PrimeIT é uma empresa líder com 19 escritórios internacionais, focada em fornecer serviços de IT, Telecomunicações e Engenharia. Impulsionamos o negócio dos nossos parceiros, utilizando a tecnologia mais avançada e os melhores profissionais do setor. Os nossos 18 anos de experiência tornam-nos especialistas em Team Extension, Nearshore, Managed Services e Custom Software. Para isso, contamos atualmente com uma equipa de mais de 2350 profissionais que colaboram em projetos nacionais e internacionais nas mais diversas tecnologias.




LISBOA | PORTO | MADRID | BARCELONA | PARIS | LYON | NANTES | LILLE | AIX-EN-PROVENCE | BORDEAUX | GRENOBLE | TOURS | MILANO | GENÈVE | KATOWICE | WARSZAWA | WROCŁAW | LONDON | SÃO PAULO

✅ +5 anos de experiência como Python Developer

✅ Inglês fluente

✅ Disponibilidade para um regime híbrido no Porto




O que oferecemos?

✅Integração numa empresa de dimensão internacional que cresce diariamente;

✅Acompanhamento e progressão de carreira.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
O GSS Group encontra-se a recrutar para a função de SOFTWARE ENGINEER para a sua empresa Nibble com sede localizada na Trofa (Grande Porto), em regime misto (presencial e teletrabalho).

 

Responsabilidades

• Desenvolver e implementar soluções de software de alta qualidade, utilizando as melhores práticas de desenvolvimento e recorrendo às tecnologias dominantes.

• Contribuir para a especificação e o desenvolvimento de soluções novas e inovadoras.

• Definir e desenvolver a arquitetura de software.

• Colaborar em todas as fases do ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software, desde a conceção até à manutenção.

• Planeamento de testes e condições de validação das soluções desenvolvidas.

• Criar e manter APIs e serviços web robustos e escaláveis.

• Realizar testes unitários, de integração e de ponta a ponta para garantir a qualidade do código.

• Trabalhar em equipa multidisciplinar para entregar projetos complexos, com ética e responsabilidade.

• Conhecer e cooperar com os Sistemas de Gestão de I&D+I e de Gestão da Qualidade, regendo-se pelas regras de funcionamento da empresa.

 

Perfil 

• Mestrado em Engenharia Informática, ou área fim.

• Mínimo de 3 anos de experiência em desenvolvimento de software (requisito obrigatório)

• Capacidade de Projeto de Software.

• Sólidos conhecimentos em linguagens de programação (em particular, C/C++, C#, Python)

• Conhecimentos de arquitetura de computadores e microcontroladores.

• Conhecimentos de bare metal programming.

• Conhecimento em bases de dados relacionais e não relacionais (SQL, NoSQL).

• Domínio de ferramentas de controlo de versões (Git).

• Autonomia, pensamento crítico, proatividade e responsabilidade.

• Trabalho em equipa.

• Facilidade de comunicação.

• Domínio da língua inglesa.

 

O que oferecemos

• Remuneração compatível com a função e experiência demonstrada;

• Integração numa empresa sólida e em notável expansão;

• Formação à medida das necessidades de cada colaborador;

• Aposta nos nossos colaboradores através de projetos de bem-estar e felicidade organizacional.

 

Para apresentar a candidatura ao processo de seleção, por favor envie e-mail para recrutamento@gssgroup.pt contendo:

• Assunto: SOFTWARE ENGINEER

• Anexos:

Curriculum Vitae (CV) (modelo preferencial)
Carta de apresentação (com breve apresentação pessoal e motivação para a submissão da sua candidatura).

📢 Procuramos um Python Developer para projeto hibrido em Portugal!




💻 Regime: Híbrido

📍 Localização: Porto, Portugal

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT consulting company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




Decskill Talent: We believe that our people are key to our success.

Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.




Decskill Boost: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.




Decskill Connect: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.




At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




Job Opening: Senior Python Developer




About the Role:

We are looking for a Senior Python Developer with a strong background in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable applications. The ideal candidate will have extensive expertise in Python and Django, coupled with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative, hybrid environment.

Key Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain robust applications using Python and Django frameworks.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that meet business needs.
Optimize and refactor code for performance and scalability.
Implement secure and efficient integrations with APIs and third-party services.
Maintain and enhance existing applications, troubleshooting and resolving issues as needed.
Participate in code reviews, ensuring best practices and coding standards are upheld.

Requirements:

7+ years of experience in Python and Django development.
Proven expertise in developing, deploying, and maintaining web applications.
Experience with database management systems (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL).
Solid understanding of software development best practices and version control tools (e.g., Git).
Familiarity with front-end technologies is a plus (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
Fluent in English (written and spoken).
Ability to work 2 days per week on-site at our office in Porto.

What We Offer:

A dynamic and collaborative work environment.
The opportunity to work on innovative projects with a talented team.
Career growth and development opportunities.




If you’re interested in this job, please send your CV in English to sofia.gould@decskill.com with the reference "PD".




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality, or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Professional Internship - AI
HTML:
VORTEX-CoLab is a growing collaborative laboratory that brings together academia and industry partners in an innovation framework to drive technology transfer in the areas of cyber-physical systems and cybersecurity. We are embarking on a journey that combines cutting-edge research and agile market solutions to create world-class products with the highest safety guarantees.


WHO?


We are looking for master’s degree students in the fields of Computer Science and Data Science with technical skills and enthusiasm to join our team. The ideal profile includes:

  • Master’s degree in Computer Science - Data Science;
  • Knowledge in:

- Data pre-processing;

- Development of Machine Learning models;

- Statistical analysis;

- Scripting;

- Frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch.


WHAT?


As an intern at VORTEX-CoLab, you will:

  • Contribute to the work of the innovation team;
  • Work within the Scrum methodology (training provided);
  • Develop and train AI models, focusing on GenAI, for optimization in networks and embedded applications.


OBJECTIVES TO ACHIEVE


  • Develop skills in data science and machine learning applied to embedded environments;
  • Participate in innovation projects that directly impact market solutions;
  • Actively collaborate in the team, contributing to the development of GenAI model


WHY?


If your goal is to work in an applied research and cutting-edge development environment, focusing on innovation in AI and GenAI technologies, this is a unique opportunity. Here, you will:

  • Collaborate with a multidisciplinary and motivated team;
  • Gain access to training in agile methodologies and emerging technologies;
  • Develop solutions applicable to a fast-evolving market.


At VORTEX-CoLab, we combine innovative minds, academic insights, and a business mindset to transform technological challenges into world-class solutions. If you are ready to be part of this challenge, we look forward to hearing from you!

Title: Técnico(a) de Dados Científicos - Porto
HTML:
Pretendemos reforçar a nossa equipa de Operações e Eficiência - Informação Técnico-Científica com um(a) Técnico(a) de Dados Científicos.

QUEM SOMOS?

O Grupo ANF conta com uma equipa de profissionais de topo, curiosos e proativos e que gostam de desafios. A nossa missão é, todos os dias, apoiar a jornada da Farmácia com soluções robustas e inovadoras e fazer das Farmácias a rede de cuidados de saúde mais valorizada pelas Pessoas.

Acreditamos que o nosso sucesso só acontece porque temos pessoas dedicadas e comprometidas com um grande propósito, o de criar valor no sector da saúde e na sociedade em geral.

O QUE OFERECEMOS?

  • Integração em equipa jovem e dinâmica;
  • Projetos desafiantes e estratégicos;
  • Formação profissional e desenvolvimento de carreira ;
  • Pacote salarial competitivo;
  • Benefícios em vigor na organização.

PRINCIPAIS RESPONSABILIDADES:

  • Contribuir para o cumprimento dos objetivos globais da DOE (Direção de Operações e Eficiência);
  • Atualizar e assegurar a manutenção da informação técnico-científica de medicamentos e/ou produtos de saúde e bem-estar em base de dados;
  • Participar em projetos relacionados com informação de medicamentos e produtos de saúde de forma a apoiar as atividades das farmácias, profissionais de saúde e clientes.

O QUE PROCURAMOS?

  • Licenciatura / Mestrado Integrado em Ciências Farmacêuticas ou outra em outra área da Saúde (obrigatório);
  • Experiência na gestão de informação de medicamentos e produtos de saúde e bem-estar, análise técnica e regulamentar (valorizado);
  • Capacidade de análise e sistematização de informação;
  • Rigor e compromisso com o resultado;
  • Domínio das ferramentas do Office na ótica do utilizador (valorizados conhecimentos de Excel);
  • Conhecimentos da língua inglesa.

👉 Se és curioso e inovador e ambicionas trabalhar numa organização focada nas Farmácias e na Sociedade, nós queremos conhecer-te. Envia o teu CV e diz-nos qual o teu propósito e o impacto que queres ter na ANF.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Liminal is a global market intelligence and strategic advisory firm specializing in digital identity, financial crime and compliance, and IT security technology solutions across industries while also catering to the private equity and venture capital community. Founded in 2016, Liminal offers strategic and analytical services supporting executive decision-making at all product and business lifecycle stages. We advise some of the world’s most prominent business leaders, investors, and policymakers on building, acquiring, and investing in the next generation of solutions and technologies. We provide access to proprietary data and analysis, strategic frameworks, and integrated insights on the industry’s only market intelligence platform.

Every major company in the world has started focusing on the next generation of digital identity technologies as a necessity for continued growth and security. Our team works with a myriad of organizations, from Fortune 100s to startups, across industries including financial services, technology, telecommunications, and the P2P economy. At Liminal, we help businesses build solutions, execute strategies, invest intelligently, and connect with key decision-makers. We know that it’s in the sharing of discovery and insights that groundwork is laid, problems are solved, and entire sectors advance at the speed of light. Keeping information to ourselves delays progress for all. At Liminal, we don't just respond to the market; we define it.

About The Role

This role focuses on the end-to-end lifecycle of AI and machine learning solutions, from ideation and development to deployment and ongoing maintenance of production-grade systems. Reporting to the AI Solutions Architect and partnering closely with the Chief Product Officer and Chief Innovation Officer, the Senior Machine Learning Engineer will play an important role in building scalable, robust, and efficient AI-driven software solutions. This individual must be able to bridge exploratory projects with production systems, ensuring seamless transitions and operational excellence.

What You'll Do

AI Solution Development and Deployment:


Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and design AI solutions aligned with business objectives.
Build, deploy, and maintain production-grade machine learning models and systems that drive efficiency and innovation across multiple departments.
Ensure AI solutions meet performance, scalability, and reliability standards in a production environment.


Model Optimization And Maintenance


Continuously improve machine learning models through fine-tuning, retraining, and incorporating new data and feedback.
Monitor and optimize the performance of deployed models and systems, implementing updates and resolving issues proactively.
Work with the AI Solutions Architect to develop pipelines for automated retraining, testing, and deployment of AI models.


Cloud Infrastructure And Integration


Leverage cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for model deployment, orchestration, and monitoring.
Implement and manage robust infrastructure to support AI applications, ensuring scalability and fault tolerance.


Pipeline Development And Data Engineering


Develop and maintain data pipelines for efficient data ingestion, preprocessing, and feature engineering.
Support integration of AI models into existing software systems, collaborating with product and engineering teams.


Exploratory Analysis And Proof Of Concept Development


Conduct exploratory analyses to identify opportunities for AI innovation.
Design and prototype solutions, validating feasibility through proof of concept (PoC) projects.
Work closely with cross-functional stakeholders to develop experimental projects and transition them into fully developed systems.


Performance Monitoring And Troubleshooting


Implement monitoring tools to track model performance, system reliability, and data integrity.
Diagnose and address issues in deployed solutions, ensuring minimal downtime and consistent results.
Documentation and Compliance:
Maintain comprehensive documentation of workflows, models, and system designs to support transparency and collaboration.
Adhere and enforce existing organizational standards.


Qualifications


3+ years of experience in ML/AI development including production-environment deployments
Bachelor's degree or higher in a relevant field.
Proficiency in Python and its machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Hands-on experience with data pipeline development, including data ingestion, preprocessing, and feature engineering.
Experience with large language models (LLMs) and natural language processing (NLP), including prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques.
Knowledge of advanced methods such as Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and platforms like OpenAI or Hugging Face.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot and optimize complex AI systems.
Strong communication skills to work effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Show more

  • Knowledge of advanced methods such as Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and platforms like OpenAI or Hugging Face.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot and optimize complex AI systems.
  • Strong communication skills to work effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Title: Python Backend Developer (HYBRID @PORTO)
Description:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!




We are looking for an Amazing: PYTHON Developer

Seniority: 4+

Type of position: Hybrid (2x/week at Porto Office)




The amazing you, will have:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
4+ years of experience in software development with Python, with a strong background in backend development.
Strong knowledge of object-oriented programming principles, design patterns, and software engineering best practices.
Comfortable working with SQL and No-SQL Databases.
Basic knowledge of the Linux command line.
Experience with Clouds, Rest API’s and Microservices Architectures.
DevOps mindset (CI/CD knowledge) and experience with tests.
Understanding of software development methodologies, such as Agile or Scrum, and experience working in collaborative development environments.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to quickly understand and debug complex software applications.
Availability for a hybrid regime at Porto (Portugal).
Fluency in English is mandatory.







To turn yourself from amazing to unique, you´ll have (plus):

Related Certifications.







Why should you become part of our family?

You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!




Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

  • 4+ years of experience in software development with Python, with a strong background in backend development.
  • Strong knowledge of object-oriented programming principles, design patterns, and software engineering best practices.
  • Comfortable working with SQL and No-SQL Databases.
  • Basic knowledge of the Linux command line.
  • Experience with Clouds, Rest API’s and Microservices Architectures.
  • DevOps mindset (CI/CD knowledge) and experience with tests.
  • Understanding of software development methodologies, such as Agile or Scrum, and experience working in collaborative development environments.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to quickly understand and debug complex software applications.
  • Availability for a hybrid regime at Porto (Portugal).
  • Fluency in English is mandatory.



To turn yourself from amazing to unique, you´ll have (plus):

  • Related Certifications.



Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
  • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
  • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
  • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!


Who are we?

  • Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Title: AI Engineer (Mid)
Description:
We are Körber – an international technology group

With about 12,000 employees, more than 100 locations worldwide and a common goal:

We turn entrepreneurial thinking into customer success and shape the technological change.

In the Business Areas Digital, Pharma, Supply Chain, and Technologies, we offer products, solutions and services that inspire. We act fast to customer needs, execute ideas seamlessly, and with our innovations, we create added value for our customers. In doing so, we are increasingly building on ecosystems that solve the challenges of today and tomorrow.

At Körber Digital we provide state-of-the-art global IT services and offer expertise in cloud architecture, cybersecurity, deep tech, and AI – making us a key driver of the Group’s digital transformation.

We are data scientists, engineers, IT specialists, designers, product experts, and venture builders. We are a team, united by the shared ambition to exploit the value of data, leverage the advantage of corporate power and a startup's proficiency with new technologies to develop industry-leading software solutions and build innovative digital tech ventures that transform global manufacturing.

Job Title: AI Engineer (Mid) - Porto

Job Overview

We are seeking a motivated AI Engineer to join Körber Digital. This role is pivotal in developing rapid and efficient prototypes with a strong focus on AI technologies. The ideal candidate will possess a blend of technical expertise, creativity, a 'hacker mindset', and a passion for staying ahead in the fast-evolving AI landscape. They should be comfortable in a dynamic, agile work environment and excel at creative problem-solving.

Key Responsibilities



Develop and iterate AI prototypes and products rapidly, ensuring they meet the users’ objectives and vision
Apply DevOps best practices, including the use of Docker and hosting of applications, to streamline development and deployment processes
Utilize Python programming language effectively, with proficiency in libraries such as Langchain, Pandas, and Streamlit
Integrate various APIs to enhance prototype functionalities and interactions
Exhibit expertise in Large Language Models (LLM), leveraging their capabilities in product development
Implement testing best practices to ensure reliability and performance of prototypes
Maintain high standards of code quality
Actively stay informed of the latest developments in the AI field, continuously integrating new insights and technologies into prototype development
Act as a sparring partner to the team for technical questions



Required Skills And Qualifications



Proven experience in developing AI products
Strong knowledge of DevOps best practices, including experience with Docker and application hosting on Azure or AWS
Proficient in Python and familiar with libraries such as Langchain, Pandas, and Streamlit
Demonstrated experience with API integrations
In-depth understanding of Large Language Models (LLM) and their applications
Experience with Hugging Face
Dedication to writing clean maintainable code, while balancing the trade-off between fast development and efficient code
Eagerness and curiosity to keep up-to-date with advancements in AI, related technologies and the ever-changing landscape of new tools
Willingness to work in a multidisciplinary and entrepreneurial team



Preferred Qualifications



A degree in Computer Science, STEM, or related field
Previous experience in a fast-paced and/or entrepreneurial environment
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a dynamic company



At Körber Digital we know that the fastest and most rewarding path to success is one that combines different talents, backgrounds, and ideas. Driving equality empowers our team, enables us to innovate, and helps us maintain a more inclusive environment.

Become part of our amazing journey!
Show more

Title: Especialista de Testes (m/f) – Híbrido (Porto)
Description:
Descrição da Empresa

Somos uma Consultora com competências multidisciplinares dotada de um portfólio que abrange diversas áreas, como Financeira, Telecomunicações, Automóvel. Desenvolvemos Produtos e Projectos. Estamos presentes em empresas de referência Nacionais e Internacionais. A nossa combinação única de soluções tecnológicas, metodologias e os nossos recursos humanos qualificam a entrega aos nossos clientes.

Descrição da Função

A Match Profiler é uma consultora de Sistemas de Informação que atua desde 1999 no mercado nacional e internacional. Temos competências multidisciplinares e know-how na área de IT que nos permite contribuir, otimizar e progredir com os nossos clientes. Para integrar equipa do nosso cliente estamos de momento a recrutar profissionais com o seguinte perfil: Especialista de Testes (m/f) – Híbrido (Porto) O que precisas de ter: Hard skills


Licenciatura ou mestrado em Ciências da Computação, Engenharia Informática ou similares
Experiência mínima de 5 anos na função de Quality Assurance Tester utilizando técnicas de testes automatizados e Continuous Integration
Experiência mínima de 3 anos, em especificação, desenho, planeamento e execução de casos de testes funcionais, testes de regressão, carga e outros processos de conformidade
Capacidade de desenhar matrizes de rastreabilidade para os Testes aplicacionais Soft skills
Boa comunicação
Espírito de equipa
Proactividade
Gestão de tempo O que nós podemos proporcionar:
Acompanhamento personalizado por parte da tua equipa
O teu manager vai estar atento às tuas motivações e sugestões
As vitórias e conquistas serão festejadas em conjunto
Acompanhamento da nossa equipa de Recursos Humanos e Suporte
Feedback constante do teu trabalho
Uma rede de centenas de parcerias com empresas de inúmeros setores que te oferecem descontos exclusivos (saúde, bem-estar, viagens, gastronomia, cultura, lazer, formação, etc)
E como é óbvio bastantes eventos e convívios Localização
Porto, Portugal
